
1a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug ba rgyal sras zhi ba lhas mdzad pa bzhugs/
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi satwa tsaryA ba tA ra/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa/ sangs
1b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs chos kyi sku mnga' sras bcas
1b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /phyag 'os kun la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ /bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa ni/ /lung
1b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya/ /sngon chad ma byung ba yang 'dir brjod med/ /sdeb sbyor mkhas pa'ang bdag
2a1(mdo 'grel): la yod min te/ de phyir gzhan don bsam pa bdag la med/ /rang gi yid la bsgom phyir ngas 'di brtsams/ /
2a2(mdo 'grel): dge ba bsgom phyir bdag gi dad pa'i shugs/ /'di dag gis kyang re zhig 'phel 'gyur la/ /bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa gzhan
2a3(mdo 'grel): gyis kyang/ /ci ste 'di dag mthong na don yod 'gyur/ /dal 'byor 'di ni rnyed par shin tu dka' / /skyes bu'i don sgrub thob par
2a4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa la/ /gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsgrubs na/ /byis 'di yang dag 'byor par ga la 'gyur/ /ji ltar mtshan mo mun nag sprin
2b1(mdo 'grel): rum na/ /glog 'gyu skad cig rab snang ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mthu yis brgya lam na/ /'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 
2b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /de ltas dge ba nyam chung nyid la brtag /sdig pa stobs chen shin tu mi bzod pa/ /de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems min pa/ /dge gzhan
2b3(mdo 'grel): gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /bskal pa du mar rab dgongs mdzad pa yi/ /thub dbang rnams kyis 'di? nyid phan par gzigs/ /'dis
2b4(mdo 'grel): ni tshad med skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /bde mchog bde blag nyid du thob par byed/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal brgya phrag gzhom 'dod cing/ /sems
2b5(mdo 'grel): can mi bde bsal bar 'dod pa dang/ /bde mang brgya phrag spyad par 'dod pas kyang/ /byang chub sems nyid rtag tu gtang mi bya/ /byang chub sems
3a1(mdo 'grel): skyes gyur na skad cig gis/ /'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa'i nyam thag rnams/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sras? zhes brjod bya zhing/ /'jig rten
3a2(mdo 'grel): lha mir bcas pas phyag byar 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa mchog lta bur/ /mi gtsang lus 'di blangs nas rgyal ba'i sku/ /rin chen rin thang med par bsgyur bas
3a3(mdo 'grel): na/ /byang chub sems zhes bya ba rab brtan zung/ /'gro ba'i ded dpon gcig pu tshad med blos/ /legs par yongs su brtags na rin che bas/ /'gro ba'i gnas dang
3a4(mdo 'grel): bral bar 'dod pa rnams/ /rin chen byang chub sems legs brtan par zung/ /dge ba gzhan kun chu shing bzhin du ni/ /'bras bu bskyed nas zad par 'gyur ba nyid//
3a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems kyi ljon shing rtag par yang/ /'bras bu 'byin pas mi zad 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas na yang/ /dpa' la brten nas 'jigs
3b1(mdo 'grel): pa chen po ltar/ /gang la brten nas yud kyis sgrol 'gyur ba/ /de la bag can rnams kyis cis mi brten/ /des ni dus mdza' i me bzhin sdig chen rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis nges par
3b2(mdo 'grel): bsreg par byed/ /de yi phan yon dpag tu med pa dag /byams mgon blo dang ldan pas nor bzang bshad/ /byang chub sems de mdor bsdu na/ /rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste/ /byang chub smon
3b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems dang ni/ /byang chub 'jug pa nyid yin no/ /'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba yi/ /bye brag ji ltar shes pa ltar/ /de bzhin mkhas pas 'di gnyis kyis/ /bye brag rim bzhin shes par bya//
3b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub smon pa'i sems las ni/ /'khor tshe 'bras bu che 'byung yang/ /ji ltar 'jug pa'i sems bzhin du/ /bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min/ /gang nas bzung ste sems can khams/ /mdza' 
3b5(mdo 'grel): yas rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /mi ldog pa yi sems kyis su/ /sems de yang dag blangs gyur pa/ /de nas gzung ste gnyid log gam/ /bag med gyur kyang bsod nams shugs/ /rgyun mi 'chad
3b6(mdo 'grel): bar du ma zhig /nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'byung/ /'di ni 'thad pa dang bcas par/ /lag bzangs kyis ni zhus pa las/ /dman mos sems can don gyi phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
4a1(mdo 'grel): kyis gsungs/ /sems can rnams kyi slad nad tsam/ /bsal lo snyam du bsams na yang/ /phan 'dogs bsam pa dang ldan te/ /bsod nams dpag med ldan gyur na/ /sems can re re'i mi bde
4a2(mdo 'grel): ba/ /dpag tu med pa bsal 'dod cing/ /re re'ang yon tan dpag med du/ /bsgrub par 'dod pa smos ci dgos/ /pha 'am yang na ma yang rung/ /su la 'di 'dra'i phan sems yod/ /lha dang drang srong rnams kyang rung/ /tshangs
4a3(mdo 'grel): pa la yang 'di yod dam/ /sems can de dag nyid la sngon/ /rang gi don duAng 'di 'dra'i sems/ /rmi lam du yang ma rmis ni/ /gzhan gyi don du ga la skye/ /gzhan dag rang gi don du yang/ /mi 'byung sems can don sems
4a4(mdo 'grel): gang/ /sems kyi rin chen khyad par 'di/ /bla na med pa'i rmad cig 'khrungs/ /'gro ba kun gyi dga' ba'i rgyu/ /sems can sdug bsngal rtsir gyur pa/ /rin chen sems kyi bsod nams gang/ /de la ji ltar gzhan gyis
4a5(mdo 'grel): lang/ /phan par bsams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /sangs rgyas mchod las khyad 'phags na/ /sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/ /bde don brtson pa smos ci dgos/ /sdug bsngal 'dor 'dod sems yod kyang/ /sdug bsngal nyid la
4a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par rgyug /bde ba 'dod kyang gti mug pas/ /rang gi bde ba dgra ltar 'joms/ /gang zhig bde bas phongs pa dang/ /sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag la/ /bde ba kun gyis tshim pa dang/ /sdug bsngal thaMs cad gcod byed cing/ /gti mug kyang ni sel byed bas//
4b1(mdo 'grel): de dang dge mtshungs ga la yod/ /de 'dra'i bshes kyang ga la yod/ /bsod nams de 'dra'ang ga la yod/ /phan btags lan sngon gang yin pa/ /de yang re zhig bsngags 'os na/ /ma bcol legs par byed ba yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' smos ci dgos/ /'gro ba nyung zad nang
4b2(mdo 'grel): ma'i zad sbyor ba/ /skad cig zas tsam sbyin par byed ba dang/ /brnyas bcas nyin phyed 'grangs par byed pa yang/ /dge ba byed pa yin zhes skye bos bkur/ /sems can bgrang mdza' yas la dus ring du/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bde ba bla na med/ /yid la bsam pa
4b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' dag rdzogs byed pa/ /rtag tu sbyin ba lta zhig smos ci dgos/ /gang zhig de 'dra'i rgyal sras sbyin bdag la/ /gal te ngan sems skyed par byed na de/ /ngan sems bskyed pa'i grangs bzhin bskal par ni/ /dmyal dang? gnas phar 'gyur zhes thub bas gsungs/ /'on
4b4(mdo 'grel): te gang zhig yid rab dang byed na/ /de la 'bras bu de bas lhag bar 'phel/ /rgyal sras rnams la do gal chen pos kyang/ /sdig ba mi 'byung dge ba ngang gis 'phel/ /gang la sems kyi dam pa rin chen de/ /skyes pa de yi sku la phyag 'tshul zhing/ /gang la gnod ba byas kyang bde
4b5(mdo 'grel): 'brel ba/ /bde ba'i 'byung gnas de la skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon bshad pa ste le'u dang po'o// //rin chen sems de bzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang dam pa'i
4b6(mdo 'grel): chos/? dkon mchog dri ma med dang sangs rgyas sras/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rnams la legs par mchod/ /me tog 'bras bu ji snyed yod pa dang/ /sman gyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa dang/ /'jig rten rin chen ji snyed yod pa dang/ /chu gtsang yid du 'ong ba ci yod dang/ /rin chen ri bo dang
4b7(mdo 'grel): ni de bzhin du/ /nags tshal sa phyogs dben zhing nyams dga' dang/ /ljon shing me tog rgyan sras spung pa dang/ /shing gang 'bras bzang yal ga dung ba dang/ /lha sogs 'jig rten na yang dri dang ni/ /spos dang dpag bsam shing dang rin chen shing/ /ma rmos 'khrungs pa'i lo
5a1(mdo 'grel): tog rnam pa dang/ /gzhan yang mchod par 'os pa'i rgyan rnams ni/ /mtsho dang rdzing bu pad+mas brgyan pa dag /dad? pa shin tu skad snyan yid 'ong ldan/ /nam mkha' rab 'byams khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ /yongs su bzung ba med pa de dag gi? kun/ /blo yis blang ba?
5a2(mdo 'grel): nas thub ba skyes kyi mchog /sras dang bcas pa rnams la legs 'bul na/ /yon gnas dam pa thugs rje che rnams kyi/ /bdag la brtser dgongs bdag gi 'di dag bzhes/ /bdag ni bsod nams mi ldan bkren chen te/ /mchod pa'i nor gzhan bdag la cad ma mchis//
5a3(mdo 'grel): des na gzhan don dgongs pa'i mgon gyis 'di/ /bdag gi don slad nyid kyi mthus bzhes shig/ rgyal dang de sras rnams la bdag gis ni/ /bdag gi lus kun gtan du dbul bar bgyi/ /sems dpa' mchog rnams bdag ni yengs bzhes shig /gus pas? khyed kyi
5a4(mdo 'grel): 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi/ /bdag ni khyed kyis yongs su bzung pas na/ /srid na mi 'jigs sems can phan pa bgyi/ /sngon gyi sdig las yang dag 'da' bgyid cing/ /sdig pa gzhan yang slan chad mi bgyid do/ /khrus kyi khang pa shin tu dri zhim pa/ /shel gyi sa gzhi gsal zhing
5a5(mdo 'grel): 'tsher ba bstar/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i ka ba yid 'ong ldan/ /mu tig 'od chags bla bre bres ba der/ /de bzhin gshegs dang de yi sras rnams la/ /rin chen bum pa mang po spos kyi chu/ /yid 'ong legs par bkang ba glu dang ni/ /rol mor bcas pa du mas sku khrus gsol/ /de dag
5a6(mdo 'grel): sku la mtshungs pa med pa'i gos/ /gtsang la dri rab bsgos pas sku phyi'o/ /de nas de la kha dog legs bsgyur ba'i/ /na bza' shin tu dri zhim dam pa dbul/ /gos bzang srab la 'jam pa sna tshogs dang/ /rgyan mchog brgya phrag de dang de dag gis/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang
5a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'jam dbyangs dang/ /'jig rten dbang phyug sogs la'ang brgyan? par bgyi/ /stong gsum kun tu dri dang ldang ba yi/ /dri mchog rnams kyis thub dbang kun gyi sku/ /gser sbyangs bco ma byi dor byas pa ltar/ /'od chags 'bar bde dag byug par bgyi/ /thub dbang mchod gnas
5b1(mdo 'grel): mchog la? yid 'ong ba'i/ /me tog man dar? dang pad+ma dang/ /utpal la sogs dri zhim thams cad dang/ /phred ba spol legs yid 'ong rnams kyis mchod/ /spos mchog yid 'phrog dri dang khyab pa yi/ /bdug pa'i sprin cho? zhes kyang de la dbul/ /zhal zas bza' btung sna tshogs
5b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa yi/ /lha bshos rnams kyang de la dbul bar bgyi/ /gser gyi pad+ma tshar du dngar? ba yi/ /rin chen sgron me rnams kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /sa gzhi bstar ba spos kyis byugs pa der/ /me tog yid 'ong sil ma dgram par bgyi/ /gzhal med pho brang bstod dbyangs
5b3(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong ldan/ /mu tig rin chen rgyan 'phyang mdzes 'bar pa/ /dpag yas nam mkha' i rgyan gyur de dag kyang/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin can la dbul bar bgyi/ /rin chen gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can/ /khor yug rgyan gyi rnam pa yid 'ong ldan/ /dbyibs legs lta na sdug pa
5b4(mdo 'grel): bsgred pa yang/ /rtag tu thub dbang rnams la dbul bar bgyi/ /de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs/ /rol mo dbyangs snyan yid 'ong ldan/ /sems can sdug bsngal tshim byed pa'i/ /sprin rnams so sor gnas gyur cig/ dam chos dkon mchog thams cad dang/ /mchod rten rnams
5b5(mdo 'grel): dang sku gzugs la/ /rin chen me tog la sogs char/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par shog /ji ltar 'jam dbyangs la sogs pas/ /rgyal ba rnams la mchod mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po sras dang bcas rnams mchod/ /yon tan rgya mtsho
5b6(mdo 'grel): rnams la bdag/ bstod dbyangs yan lag rgya mtshos bstod/ /bstod dbyangs snyan sprin de dag la/ /nges par kun tu 'byung gyur cig /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /chos dang tshogs kyi mchog bcas la/ /zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi/ /lus btud pas ni bdag
5b7(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub sems kyi gzhi rnams dang/ /mchod rten kun la'ang bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mkhan po de bzhin slob dpon dang/ /brtul zhugs mchod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchis/ /chos dang
6a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi/ /phyogs rnams kun na zhugs pa yi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' rnams la/ /thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni/ /thog ma med ldan 'khor
6a2(mdo 'grel): ba nas/ /tshe rabs 'di 'am gzhan dag tu/ /bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa 'am/ /bgyid du stsal ba nyid dang ni/ /gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/ /rjes su yi rang gang bgyis pa/ /nongs pa de ni mthong bgyis nas/ /bsam pa thag pas mgon la bshags/ /
6a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis dkon mchog gsum dang ni/ /pha ma 'am bla ma gzhan dag la/ /nyon mongs sgo nas lus ngag dang/ /yid kyis gnod bgyis gang lags dang/ /nyes pa du ma'i skyon chags pa'i/ /sdig can bdag gis sdig pa gang/ /shin tu mi bzad bgyis pa de/ /thams
6a4(mdo 'grel): cad 'dren pa rnams la 'chags/ /bdag ni sdig pa ma byad bar/ /sngon du 'gum par 'gyur du mchi/ /ji ltar 'di las des thar bar/ /myur ba'i tshul gyis bskyab tu gsol/ /yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/ /byas dang ma byas mi sdod pas/ /na dang min kun gyis kyang
6a5(mdo 'grel): glo bur che la yid mi brtan/ /thams cad bor te cha dgos pas/ /bdag gis de ltar ma shes pas/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' don gyi phyir/ /sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /mi mdza' rnams kyang med 'gyur zhing/ /mdza' ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang med
6a6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de bzhin thams cad med par 'gyur/ /rmi lam nyams su myong ba bzhin/ /dngos po gang dang gang spyad pa/ /de de dran pa'i yul du 'gyur/ /'das pa thams cad mthong mi 'gyur/ /re zhig gson tshe 'di nyid la/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' du ma 'das/ /de
6a7(mdo 'grel): dag don du byas pa'i sdig /mi bzad gang yin mdun na gnas/ /de ltar bdag ni blo bur zhes/ /bdag gis rtogs par ma gyur pas/ /gti mug chags dang zhe sdang gis/ /sdig pa rnam pa du ma byas/ /nyin mtshan sdod pa yod med bar/ /tshe 'di rtag tu gong 'gyur zhing//
6b1(mdo 'grel): snon pa gung nas 'ong med na/ /bdag lta 'chi bar cis mi 'gyur/ bdag ni mal na 'dug bzhin du/ /gnyen bshes rnams kyis mdza' bskor yang/ /srog 'chad pa yi tshor pa dag /bdag nyid gcig bus myong bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i pho nyas zin pa la?  /gnyen gyis ci phan pa shes ci phan/ /de tshe
6b2(mdo 'grel): bsod nams gcig skyabs na/ /de yang bdag gis ma bsten to/ /mgon po bag med bdag gis ni/ /'jigs pa 'di 'dra ma 'tshal nas/ /mi rtag tshe 'di'i ched dag tu/ /sdig pa mang po nye bar bsgrubs/ /skye bo yan lag bcad pa'i sar/ /di ring khrid pa'ang bred 'gyur te/ /bskams mig rtsa ngan
6b3(mdo 'grel): la sogs/ /snga las gzhan du 'gyur snang na/ /gshin rje'i pho nya 'jigs 'jigs lta'i/ /sha tshugs can gyis bzung gyur cing/ /'jigs chen nad kyis thebs gyur pa/ /rab tu nyam thag smos cing gos/ /su zhig 'jigs chen 'di las bdag /legs par skyob par byed 'gyur zhes/ /bred sha
6b4(mdo 'grel): thon pa'i mig bgrad nas/ /phyogs bzhir skyabs dag tshol bar byed/ /phyogs bzhir skyabs med mthong nas ni/ /de nas kun tu yi mug 'gyur?/ /gnas der skyabs yod ma yin na/ /de tshe bdag gis ji ltar bya/ /de bas rgyal ba 'gro ba'i mgon/ /'gro ba skyob pa'i don brtson pa/ /stobs chen
6b5(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa kun sel la/ /de ring nyid nas skyabs su mchi/ /de yi thugs su chung ba'i chos/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa sel ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs la yang/ /de bzhin yang dag skyabs su mchi/ /bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam sgrag nas/ /kun tu bzang la bdag nyid 'bul//
6b6(mdo 'grel): 'jam dpal dbyangs la'ang bdag nyid kyis/ /bdag gi lus ni dbul bar bgyi/ /thugs rjes spyod pa ma 'khrul pa/ /spyan ras gzigs mgon de la yang/ /nyam thag da ros 'o dod 'bod/ /sdig can bdag la skyab tu gsol/ /'phags pa nam mkha' i snying po dang/ /sa yi snying po dag dang ni/ /thugs
6b7(mdo 'grel): rje che mgon thams cad la/ /skyabs tshol snying nas 'o dod 'bod/ /gang zhig mthong na? gshin rje yi/ /pho nya la sogs sdang ba rnams/ /skrag nas phyogs bzhir 'byed mdzad pa/ /rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi/ /sngon chad khyed kyi bka' las 'das/ /da ni 'jigs pa che mthong nas/ khyed la
7a1(mdo 'grel): skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ /'jigs pa myur du bsal du gsol/ /tha mal nad kyis 'jigs na yang/ /sman ba'i dag bzhin bya dgos na/ /'dod chags la sogs nyes brgya yi/ /nad kyi rtag btab smos ci dgos/ /de gcig gis kyang 'jam gling ni/ /gnas pa'i
7a2(mdo 'grel): mi kun rlag byed la/ /de dag gso ba'i sman gzhan ni/ /phyogs rnams kun nas mi rnyed na/ /de la sman pa thams cad mkhyen/ /zug rngu thams cad 'byin pa yi/ /bka' ltar mi byed sems pa ni/ /shin tu gti mug smad pa'i gnas/ /g.yang sa tha mal chung du la'ang/ /bag yod gnas bar
7a3(mdo 'grel): bya dgos na/ /dpag tshad stong du lhung ba yi/ /yun ring g.yang sar smos ci dgos/ /di ring kho na mi 'chi zhes/ /bde bar 'dug pa rigs ma yin/ /bdag ni med par 'gyur ba'i dus/ /de ni gdon mi za bar 'byung/ /bdag la mi 'jigs su yi byin/ /'di las ji ltar nges thar zhes/ /gdon
7a4(mdo 'grel): mi za bar med 'gyur na/ /ci phyir bdag yid bde bar 'dug/ sngon chang myong ste zhig pa las/ /bdag la lhag pa ci yod na/ /bdag ni de la sngon zhen nas/ /bla ma'i bka' dang 'gal bar byas/ /gson tshe 'di dang de bzhin du/ /gnyen dang bshes pa rnams spangs nas/ /gcig pu
7a5(mdo 'grel): gshed 'gro dgos na/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' kun ci rung/ /mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung/ /de las ji ltar nges thar shes/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu bdag gis ni/ /'di nyid 'ba' zhig bsam pa'i rigs /bdag ni mi shes gti mug pas/ /rang bzhin kha na ma tho ba 'am//
7a6(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i sdig pa gang yin las/ /gang yang rung ba bgyis pa rnams/ /mgon po'i spyan sngar mngon sum du/ /thal sbyar sdug bsngal 'jigs sems kyis/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'dren pa rnams kyis bdag gi sdig /nongs
7a7(mdo 'grel): pa lags par gzung du gsol/ /'di ni bzang po ma lags pas/ /slan chad bdag ni yod mi bgyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las sdig pa bshags pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //sems can kun gyi ngan song gi/ sdug bsngal
7b1(mdo 'grel): ngal so'i dge ba dang/ /sdug bsngal can dag bder gnas la/ /dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /byang chub rgyar gyur dge bsags pa/ /de la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /lus can 'khor ba'i sdugs sngal las/ /nges par thar la yi rang ngo/ /skyob ba rnams kyi byang chub dang/ /rgyal sras sa la'ang yi rang ngo//
7b2(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad bde mdzad pa'i/ /thugs bskyed dge ba rgya mtsho dang/ /sems can phan bar mdzad pa la/ /dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas la/ /thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni/ /sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la/ /chos kyi sgron me sbar du gsal
7b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni/ /'gro 'di ldongs par mi dgong cing/ /bskal ba grangs med bzhugs par gsol/ /de ltar 'di dag kun byas te/ /dge ba bdag gis bsags pa gang/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal thams cad bsal
7b4(mdo 'grel): bar shog /'gro ba nad pa ji srid du/ /nad sos gyur gyi bar du ni/ /sman dang sman pa nyid dag dang/ /de yi nad g.yog byed par shog/ zas dang skom gyi char phab ste/ /bkres dang skom pa'i gnod ba bsal/ /mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i tshe/ /bdag ni zas dang skom du gyur/ /sems
7b5(mdo 'grel): can phongs shing dbul ba la/ /bdag ni mi zad gter gyur te/ /yo byad mkho dgu sna tshogs su/ /mdun na nye bar gnas gyur cig/ lus dang de bzhin longs spyod dang/ /dus gsum dge ba thams cad kyang/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub phyir/ /phangs pa med par gtang bar bya/ /thams
7b6(mdo 'grel): cad btang bas mya ngan 'da' / /bdag blo mya ngan 'das pa bsgrub/ /thams cad gtong bar chab sa gcig la/ /sems can rnams la gtad ba mchog/ bdag gis lus can thams cad la/ /lus 'di ci bder byin zin gyis/ /rtag tu bsod dang smod pa 'am/ /brdeg sogs ci dgar
7b7(mdo 'grel): byed la rag /bdag gi lus la rtse byed dam/ /co 'dri ga zha'i rgyu byed kyang/ /bdag gis lus 'di byin zin gyis/ /'di? yi kha tas ci zhig bya/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /las gang yin pa byed du chug /bdag la dmigs nas nam du yang/ /'ga' yang don med ma gyur cig/
8a1(mdo 'grel): bdag la dmigs nas gang dag gis/ /khro ba 'am dad pa'i sems byung na/ /de nyid rtag tu de dag gi/ don kun 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig /gang dag bdag la kha zer ram/ /gzhan gang gnod pa byed pa 'am/ /de bzhin phyir? ka gtong yang rung/ /thams cad
8a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub skal ldan gyur/ /bdag ni mgon med rnams kyis mgon/ /lam zhugs rnams kyi ded dpon dang/ /rgal 'dod rnams kyi gru dang ni/ /gzings dang zam pa nyid du gyur/ /gling don gnyer la gling dang ni/ /gnas ma la 'dod la gnas mal dang/ /bdag ni lus
8a3(mdo 'grel): can bran 'dod pa/ /kun gyi bran du 'gyur bar shog /yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang/ /rig sngags grub dang sman chen dang/ /dpag bsam gyi ni shing dag dang/ /lus can rnams kyi 'dod 'jor gyur/ /sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang/ /nam mkha' bzhin du rtag bar yang//
8a4(mdo 'grel): sems can dpag tu med pa yi/ /rnam mar? nyed? 'tsho'i gzhir yang shog de bzhin nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i/ /sems can khams la rnam kun du/ /thams cad mya ngan 'das bar du/ /bdag ni nye 'tsho'i rgyud yang shog /ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis/ /byang chub
8a5(mdo 'grel): thugs ni bskyed pa dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bslab ba la/ /de dag rim bzhin gnas ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro la phan don du/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing/ /de bzhin du ni bslab pa la'ang/ /rim pa bzhin du bslab par bgyi/ /de ltar blo dang ldan pa yis/ /rab
8a6(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub sems bzung nas/ /mjug kyang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ /sems ni 'di ltar bzer bstod do/ /deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yong/ /mi yi srid ba legs par thob/ /di ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su bdag deng gyur/ /da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang
8a7(mdo 'grel): rigs dang mthun pa'i las brtsams te/ /skyon med btsun pa'i rigs 'di la/ /rnyog par mi 'gyur de ltar bya/ /long bas phyag dang phung po las/ /ji ltar rin chen rnyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin ji zhig ltar stes nas/ /byang chub sems 'di bdag la skyes/ /'gro ba'i 'chi bdag 'jomS
8b1(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i/ /bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang 'di yin no/ /'gro ba'i dbul bsel ba yi/ /mi zad gter yang 'di yin no/ /'gro ba'i nad rab zhi byed pa'i/ /sman gyi mchog kyang 'di yin no/ /srid lam 'khyams zhib dub pa yi/ /'gro ba'i ngal so ljon shing yin/ /'gro ba thams cad ngan 'gro las/ /sgrol bar byed pa'i sbyi stegs yin/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs gdung sel pa'i/ /sems kyi zla
8b2(mdo 'grel): ba shar ba yin/ /'gro ba'i mi shes rab rib dag/ dbyis? 'byin nyi ma chen po yin/ /dam chos 'o ma bsrubs pa las/ /mang gyi nying khu phyung ba yin/ /'gro ba'i 'gron pa srid pa'i lam rgyu zhing/ /bde ba'i longs spyod spyad par 'dod
8b3(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /'di ni bde ba'i mchog tu nye ba gnas te/ /sems can 'gron chen chim bar byed pa yin/ /bdag gis /di ring spyod pa thams cad kyi/ /spyan sngar 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid dang ni/ /bar du bde la mgron du bos zin gyis/ /lha dang lha min la sogs dga' bar gyis/ /byang chub sems
8b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ /byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //rgyal ba'i sras kyis de lta bur/ /byang chub sems rab brtan bzung nas/ /g.yel ba med par rtag tu yang/ /bslab las mi 'da' 'bad bar bya/ /bab col brtsams
8b5(mdo 'grel): ba gang yin pa 'am/ /gang zhig legs par ma brtags pa/ /de ni dam bcas byas gyur kyang/ /bya 'am btang zhes brtag pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras/ /shes rab chen pos gang brtags shing/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang brtag brtags pa/ /de la bshol du ci zhig yod/ /gal te de ltar
8b6(mdo 'grel): dam bcas nas/ /las gyis bsgrub par ma byas na/ /sems can de dag kun bslus pas/ /bdag gi 'gro ba ci 'drar 'gyur/ /dngos po phal pa cung zad la'ang/ /yid kyis sbyin par bsams byas nas/ /mi gang sbyin par mi byed pa/ /de yang yi dags 'gyur gsungs na/ /bla na med pa'i bde ba la
8b7(mdo 'grel): bsam pa thag pas mgron gnyer nas/ /'gro ba thams cad bslu byas nas/ /bde 'gror cig 'gro 'gyur ram/ /mi gang byang chub sems btang yang/ /de dag thar bar mdzad pa ni/ /las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kho nas mkhyen/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' la
9a1(mdo 'grel): ltung ba'i nang na lci ba ste/ /'di ltar de ni byung gyur na/ /sems can kun gyi don la dman/ /gang gzhan 'ga' zhig 'di yi ni/ /bsod nams bar chad gegs byed pa/ /sems can don la dman gyur pas/ /de yi ngan 'gro mu mdza' med/ /sems can gcig gi bde bar
9a2(mdo 'grel): bshig na bdag nyid nyams 'gyur na/ /nam mkha' ma lus mdza' klas pa'i/ /lus can bde bshig smos ci dgos/ /de ltar ltung ba stobs ldan dang/ /byang chub sems stobs ldan pa dag /'khor bar res kyis 'dre byed na/ /sa thob pa la yun ring thogs/ /de ltas ji ltar dam
9a3(mdo 'grel): bcas bzhin/ /bdag gis gus par bsgrub par bya/ /deng nas brtson par ma byas na/ /'og nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad phan mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas grangs med 'das gyur kyang/ /bdag ni rang gi nyes pas de'i/ /gso ba'i spyod yul ma gyur to//
9a4(mdo 'grel): da dung de bzhin bdag byed na/ /yang dang yang duAng de bzhin te/ /ngan 'gror nad dang 'ching ba dang/ /gtsad dang gsheg sogs myong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang/ /dang dang mi lus thob pa dang/ /dge goms rung ba de lta bur/ /dkon pa nam zhig thob par 'gyur//
9a5(mdo 'grel): nad med nyi ma 'di lta bur/ /zas bcas 'tshe ba med kyang ni/ /tshe 'di skad cig bslu ba ste/ /lus 'di thad cig brnyan po bzhin/ /bdag gi spyod pa 'di 'dras ni/ /mi yi lus kyang thob mi 'gyur/ /mi lus thob par ma gyur na/ /sdig ba 'ba' zhig dge ba med/ /gang tshe dge spyad skal ldan yang//
9a6(mdo 'grel): dge ba bdag gis ma byas na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal kun rmongs pa/ de tshe bdag gis ci byar yod/ /dge ba dag kyang ma byas la/ /sdig pa dag kyang nyer bsags na/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni/ /bde 'gro'i sgra yang thos mi 'gyur/ /de nyid phyir na bcom ldan gyis/ /rgya mtsho cher
9a7(mdo 'grel): g.yengs gnya' shing gi /bu gang rus sbal mgrin chung ltar/ /mi nyid shin tu thob dkar gsungs/ /skad cig gcig byas sdig pas kyang/ /bskal par mnar med gnas 'gyur na/ /thog med 'khor bar bsags sdig gis/ /bde 'gror mi 'gro smos ci dgos/ /de tsam kho na
9b1(mdo 'grel): myong gyur nas/ /de ni rnam thar mi 'gyur te/ /'di ltar de ni myong bzhin du bsdig pa gzhan dag rab tu skye/ /'di 'dra'i dal brnyed gyur nas/ /bdag gis dge goms ma byas na/ /'di las bslus pa gzhan med de/ /'di las rmongs pa'ang gzhan med do/ /gal te bdag gis de rtogs nas/ /rmongs pas
9b2(mdo 'grel): phyis kyang sgyid lug na/ /'chi bar 'gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /mya ngan chen po ldang bar 'gyur/ /dmyal ma bzod dkas yun ring du/ /bdag gi lus la sreg 'gyur na/ /'gyod pa mi bzad me 'bar bas/ /sems gdung 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /shin tu rnyed dka' phan pa'i sa/ /ji zhig ltar
9b3(mdo 'grel): stes rnyed gyur nas/ /bdag nyid shes dang ldan bzhin du /phyir yang dmyal ba der khrid na/ /sngags kyis rmongs bar byas pa bzhin/ /bdag la 'dir sems med du zad/ /ci rmongs bdag kyang ma shes te/ /bdag gi khong na ci zhig yod/ /zhe sdang sred sogs dgra rnams ni/ /rkang lag la
9b4(mdo 'grel): sogs yod min la/ /dpa' mdzangs min yang ci zhig ltar/ /de dag gis bdag bran bzhin byas/ /bdag gi sems la gnas bzhin du/ /dga' dgur bdag la gnod byed pa/ /de la'ang mi khro bzod pa ni/ gnas min bzod pa smad pa'i gnas/ /gal te lha dang lha min rnams/ /thams cad
9b5(mdo 'grel): bdag la dgrar 'das kyang/ /de dag gis kyang mnar med pa'i/ /me nang khrid cing 'jug mi nus/ /nyon mongs stobs can dgra 'dis ni/ /gang dang phrad na ri rab kyang/ /thal ba yang ni ma lus pa/ der bdag skad cig gcig la 'dor/ /bdag gi nyon mongs dgra bo gang/ /dus ring thogs mdza' med pa ltar//
9b6(mdo 'grel): dgra gzhan kun kyang de lta bur/ /yun ring thug pa ma yin no/ /mthun par rim gro bstan byas na/ /thams cad phan dang bde byed na/ /nyon mongs rnams ni bsten byas na/ /phyir zhing sdug bsngal gnod pa byed/ /de ltar yun ring rgyun chags drag gyur pa/ /gnod pa'i tshogs rab 'phel ba'i rgyu gcig pu/ /bdag
9b7(mdo 'grel): gi snying la des bar gnas 'cha' na/ /'khor bar 'jig med dka' bdag la 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i brtson ra'i srung nas dmyal sogs su/ /gsong byed gsher mar gyur pa 'di dag ni/ /gal te blo gnas chags pa'i dra ba na/ /gnas na bdag la bde ba ga la yod/ /de ltas ji srid bdag gis dgra 'di mngon suM du
10a1(mdo 'grel): nges par ma bcom de srid bdag 'dir brtson mi 'dor/ /re zhig gnod byed chung du la yang khros gyur pa'i/ /nga rgyal bdo rnams de ma bcos par gnyid mi 'ong/ /rang bzhin 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyur ba'i nyon mongs dag /g.yul dong dngar tshe nan gyis gzhom par 'dod pa yang
10a2(mdo 'grel): mda' mdung mtshon gyis phog pa'i sdug bsngal khyad bsad nas/ /don ma grub par phyir phyogs 'byer bar mi byed na/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal kun gyi rgyur gyur pa/ /rang bzhin dgra nges gzhom brtson bdag la de/ /sdug bsngal brgya phrag rgyur gyur gang gis kyang/ /yid chad sgyid lug mi 'gyur smos ci dgos//
10a3(mdo 'grel): don med dgra yis rna srol gtod pa yang/ /lus la rgyun dang 'dra par bsrel bar byed/ /don chen bsgrub phyir yang dag brtson gyur pa/ /bdag la sdug bsngal ci phyir gnod byed yin/ /nya pa gdol ba zhing pa la sogs pa/ /rang gi 'tsho ba tsam zhig sems pa yang/ /grang dang tshal sogs pa'i gnod
10a4(mdo 'grel): bzod na/ /'gro ba bde phyir bdag lta cis mi bzod/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i/ /'gro ba nyon mongs las bsgral bar/ /dam bcas gang tshe bdag nyid kyang/ /nyon mongs rnams las ma grol bar/ /bdag gi tshod kyang mi shes par/ /smra ba ji ltar smyon pa min/ /de ltas nyon
10a5(mdo 'grel): mongs gzhom pa la/ /rtag tu phyir mi ldog par bya/ /'di la bdag gi zhe na bya zhing?/ khon du bzung nas g.yul sprang de/ /rnam pa de 'dra'i nyon mongs pa/ /nyon mongs 'joms byed ma gtogs so/ /bdag ni srogs te bsar gyur tam/ /bdag gi mgo bo bcad kyang bla'i/ /rnam pa kun tu
10a6(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i/ /dgra la 'dud par mi bya'o/ /tha mal dgra bo yul nas phyung yang ni/ /yul gzhan dag tu gnas shing yongs bzung nas/ /nus pa rtas nas de nas phyir ldog gi /nyon mongs dgra tshul de dang 'dra ma yin/ /nyon mongs nyon mongs shes rab mig gis spang/ /bdag yid
10a7(mdo 'grel): las bsal gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang du gnas nas bdag gnod bya phyir 'ong/ /blo zhan ni bdag la brtson pa med par zad/ /nyon mongs rnams ni yul na mi gnas dbang sogs la min bar na'ang min/ /de las gzhan na'ang min na 'di dag gar gnas 'gro ba kun gnod byed/ /'di ni rgyu
10b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra de phyir snying la 'jigs spong shes phyir brtson pa bsten/ /don med nyid du bdag la dmyal sogs rnams su ci ste gnod pa byed/ /de ltar rnam bsams ji skad bshad pa yi/ /bslab pa bsgrub ba'i ched du 'bad par bya/ /sman ba'i dag ma nyan na sman dag gis/ /bcos dgos nad pa sos par ga la 'gyur/ /byang chub
10b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ /bag yod bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //bslab pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yis/ /rab tu bsgims? nas sems bsrung ste/ /sems ni bsrung bar ma byas na/ /bslab pa bsrung bar yongs mi nus/ /sems kyi glang po yang btang bas//
10b3(mdo 'grel): mnar med gnod pa byed pa ltar/ /glang chen ma dul myos pa yis/ /'di na de 'dra'i gnod mi byed/ /kun nas dran pa'i thag pa yis/ /sems kyi glang po dam btags na/ /'jigs pa thams cad med 'gyur zhing/ /dge ba thams cad lag tu 'ong/ /stag dang seng ge glang chen dred/ /sprul dang dgra rnams thaMs cad?
10b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dang/ /byad ma de bzhin srin po rnams/ /sems 'di gcig pu btags pa yis/ /de dag thams cad btags par 'gyur/ /sems 'di gcig bu btul bas na/ /de dag thams cad btul bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ /sdug bsngal dpag
10b5(mdo 'grel): tu med pa yang/ /sems las byung ba yin no zhes/ /yang dag gsung ba nyid kyis bstan/ /sems can dmyal ba'i mtshon cha rnams/ /su zhig gis ni ched du byas/ /lcags bsregs sa gzhi su yis byas/ /me tshogs de dag ci las byung/ /de 'dra de dag thams cad kyang/ /sdig sems yin par thub
10b6(mdo 'grel): pas gsungs/ /de ltar 'jig rten gsum po na/ /sems las 'jigs pa gzhan 'ga' med/ /gal te 'gro ba dbul bor nas/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin yin na/ /da dud 'gro bkren yod na sngon/ /skyob ba ji ltar pha rol phyin/ /bdog pa thams cad 'bras bcas te/ /skye bo kun la btang sems kyis
10b7(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin gsungs te/ /de ltas de ni sems nyid do/ /nya la sogs pa gang zhig tu/ /de dag gsod mi 'gyur bar bskrad/ /spod ba'i sems ni thob pa la/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin par bshad/ /sems can mi bsrun nam mkha' bzhin/ /de dag gzhom gyis yod mi lang/ /khro ba'i
11a1(mdo 'grel): sems 'di gcig bcom na/ /dgra de thams cad choms dang 'dra/ /sa steng 'di dag kos g.yogs tu/ /de snyed ko bas gal lang/ /lha ma mthil tsam gyi ko bas ni/ /sa steng thams cad g.yogs dang 'dra/ /de bzhin phyi rol dngos po yang/ /bdag gis phyir bzlog mi
11a2(mdo 'grel): lang gi /bdag gi sems ni phyir bzlog bya'i/ /gzhan rnams bzlog go ci zhig dgos/ /sems gsal gcig skyes 'bras bu gang/ /tshangs la sogs pa yin pa ltar/ /lus ngag bcas pa'i 'bras bu yang/ /spyod pa zhan pas de lta min/ /bzlas brjod dang ni dka' thub kun/ /yun ring
11a3(mdo 'grel): dus su spyad byas kyang/ /sems gzhan g.yengs pas byas pa ni/ /de nyid rig pas don med gsungs/ /gang gis chos kyi gtso bo mchog /sems kyi gsang 'di ma shes na/ /bde thob sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod kyang/ /de dag don med gyi nar 'khyam/ /de ltas bdag gi sems 'di ni//
11a4(mdo 'grel): legs bzung legs par bsrung bar bya/ /sems bsrung brtul zhugs ma gtogs pa/ /brtul zhugs mang pos ci zhig bya/ /ma grangs grol ba'i khrong gnas na/ /bsgrims te rma yi bag byed bzhin/ /skye bo ngan khrod gnas pas kyang/ /sems kyi rma 'di rtag tu bsrung/ /rma yi sdug
11a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal chung ngu yis/ /skrag pa'ang rma yi bag byed na/ /ri bo chen 'joms skrag pa yis/ /sems kyi rma lta cis mi bsrung/ /spyod pa 'di 'dras gnas byed na/ /skye bo ngan pa'i khrod gnas sam/ /bud med khrod na gnas kyang rung/ /sdom brtson brtan pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /bdag gi rnyed dang
11a6(mdo 'grel): bkur sti dang/ /lus dang 'tsho ba med bla zhing/ /dge ba gzhan yang nyams bla yi/ /sems ni nams kyang nyams mi bya/ /sems bsrung 'dod pa rnams la ni/ /dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dag /srog la bab kyang srungs shig ces/ /bdag ni de skad 'doms par byed/ /nad kyis dkrugs pa'i mi dag ni//
11a7(mdo 'grel): las rnams kun la mthu med pa/ /de bzhin rmongs pas sems dkrugs pa/ /las rnams kun la mthu med do/ /shes bzhin med pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /thos dang bsam dang bsgoms pa yang/ /glo rdol bum pa'i chu bzhin du/ /dran ba la ni de mi gnas/ /thos ldan dad pa can dang ni
11b1(mdo 'grel): brtson pa myur len du ma yang/ /shes bzhin med pa'i skyon chags pas/ /ltung ba'i rnyog dang bcas par 'gyur/ /shes bzhin med pa'i chom rkun dag dran pa nyams pa'i rjes 'brangs bas/ /bsod nams dag ni nyer bsags kyang/ /rkun pos phrogs bzhin dan 'gror 'gro/ /nyon mongs tshom rkun
11b2(mdo 'grel): tshogs 'di ni/ /glags skabs tshol bar byed pa ste/ /glags rnyed gyur nas dge 'phrog cing/ /bde 'gro'i srog kyang 'joms par byed/ /de bas dran pa'i yid sgo nas/ /gud du nam yang mi btang ngo/ /song na'ang ngan song gned pa dag /dran par byas te nye bar gzhag /bla ma dang ni 'grogs pa las
11b3(mdo 'grel): mkhan pos rjes su bstan pa dang/ /'jigs pas skal ldan gus byed la/ /dran pa bde blag skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag /kun tu thogs med gzigs par ldan/ /de dag thams cad spyan snga na/ /bdag ni rtag par gnas so zhes/ /de ltar bsams nas ngo tsha dang
11b4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs bcas dran pa rtag tu bzhag /des ni sangs rgyas rjes dran pa'ang/ /de la yang dang yang du 'byung/ /gang tshe dran pa'i yid sgo nas/ /bsrung ba'i don du gnas gyur ba/ /de tshe shes bzhin 'ong 'gyur zhing/ /song ba dag kyang phyir 'ong 'gyur/ /re zhig dang por 'di 'dra'i sems/ /de ni
11b5(mdo 'grel): skyon bcas shes byas nas/ /de tshe bdag gis shing bzhin du/ /zungs thub par ni gnas par bya/ /don med g.yeng bar lta ba ni/ /nam yang bdag gis mi bya ste/ /nges par sems pas rtag tu ni/ /mig ni phab ste blta bar bya/ /blta ba ngal so'i ched du ni/ /res dga' phyogs su blta bar
11b6(mdo 'grel): bya/ /'ga' zhig mig lam snang gyur na/ /bltas nas 'ongs pa legs zhes brjod/ /lam sogs 'jigs pa brtag pa'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du phyogs bzhir blta/ /ngal sos kha ni phyir bltas nas/ /rgyab kyi phyogs su blta bar bya/ /mdun nas rgyab du brtag byas nas/ /'gro 'am yang
11b7(mdo 'grel): ma'ong bya ste/ /de ltar gnas skabs thams cad du/ /dgos pa shes nas spyad par bya/ /lus kyis 'di ltar gnas bya zhes/ /bya ba bsdogs nas de nas ni/ /skabs su lus 'di ji lta bur/ /gnas pa yin zhes blta bar bya/ /sems kyi glang chen myos pa ni/ /chos la sems pa'i ka chen la?
12a1(mdo 'grel): ji ltar btags pa mi 'chor ba/ /de ltar 'bad ba kun gyis btag /ci nas ting 'dzin brtson par ni/ /skad cig gcig kyang mi 'tshor bar/ /bdag gi yid 'di gar spyod ces/ /de ltar yid la so sor brtag /'jigs dang dga' ston sogs 'brel bas/ /gal te mi
12a2(mdo 'grel): nus ci bder bya/ /'di ltar sbyin pa'i dus dag tu/ /tshul khrims btang snyoms bzhag par gsungs/ /gang zhig bsams te byar brtsams pa/ /de las gzhan du mi bsam ste/ /der bstang pa yi bsam pa yis/ /de nyid re zhig bsgrub par bya/ /de lta na ni kun legs byas/ /gzhan
12a3(mdo 'grel): du gnyis kar mi 'gyur ro/ /shes bzhin ma yin nye nyon mongs/ /de lta na ni 'phel mi 'gyur/ /bre mo'i gtam ni sna tshogs dang/ /ngo mtshar ltang mo rnam mang po/ /kun la 'jug par gyur pa na/ /de la chags pa spangs bar bya/ /don med sa rko rtsa gcod dang/ /sa ris 'dri sogs byed
12a4(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ /bde gshegs bslab pa dran byas nas/ /skrag pas de yi mod la dor/ /gang tshe bskyod par 'dod 'gyur tam/ /smra bar 'dod par gyur na yang/ /dang por rang gi sems brtags nas/ /brtan pas rigs pa ldan par bya/ /gang tshe rang yid chags pa dang/ /bro bar 'dod pa
12a5(mdo 'grel): de yi tshe/ /las su mi bya smra mi bya/ /shing bzhin du ni gnas par bya/ /rgod dang gzhar bcas pa 'am/ /gal te nga rgyal rgyags ldan pa 'am/ /mtshang 'dru ba yi bsam pa dang/ /gal te skyor 'byin slu sems sam/ /gang tshe bdag bstong lhur len pa 'am/ /gzhan la smod pa nyid dang
12a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ gshe bcas 'gyed dang bcas gyur pa/ /de tshe shid bzhin gnas par bya/ /rnyed dang bkur sti grags 'dod pa 'am/ /g.yog 'khor don du gnyer 'dod pa 'am/ /bdag sems rim 'gro 'dod gyur na/ /de tshe shing bzhin gnas par bya/ /gzhan don yal bar 'dor ba dang//
12a7(mdo 'grel): rang don gnyer bar 'dod pa dag /smra bar 'dod pa'i sems byung na/ /des ni shing bzhin gnas par bya/ /mi bzod le lo 'jigs pa dang/ /de bzhin spyi brtol mu cor dang/ /rang gi phyogs zhen sems byung na/ /de tshe shing bzhin gnas par bya/ /de ltar kun nas nyon mongs
12b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /don med brtson ba'i yid brtags nas/ /de tshe dpa' bos gnyen po yis/ /de ni brtan bor bzung bar bya/ /shin tu nges dang rab dad dang/ /brtan dang gus dang zhe sar bcas/ /ngo tsha shes dang 'jigs dang bcas/ /zhi zhing rab dga' byed la brtson/ /phan tshun mi mthun byis pa yi//
12b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa rnams kyis mi skyo zhing/ /nyon mongs skyes pas 'di dag gi /sems 'di byung snyam brtser ldan dang/ /kha na ma tho med dngos la/ /bdag dang sems can dbang bya zhing/ /sprul pa bzhin du nga med par/ /yid 'di rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /ring zhig lon nas dal ba'i mchog /thob pa
12b3(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang bsams nas/ /sems de lta bur rab rib ltar/ /rab tu mi g.yo gzung par bya/ /bya rgod sha? la chags pa yis/ /phan tshun kun tu gshal khri kyang/ /lus khyod mi dgar mi byed na/ /da lta ci phyir kha ta byed/ /lus 'di bdag gir gzung byas nas/ /yid khyod ci phyir srung bar byed//
12b4(mdo 'grel): khyod dang 'di gnyis so so nas/ /des ko khyod la ci zhig bya/ /rmongs pa'i yid khyod ci yi phyir/ /shing? gzugs gtsang ma gzung mi byed/ /mi gtsang tshogs kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ /rul pa bsrungs te ci zhig rung/ /thog mar pags pa'i rim pa 'di/ /rang gi blo yis tha dang phye/ /sha yang rus pa'i
12b5(mdo 'grel): dra ba las/ /shes rab mtshon gyis gung du phye/ /rus pa rnams kyang dbye byas nas/ /rkang gi bar du blta bya zhing/ /'di la snying po ci yod ces/ /bdag nyid kyis ni brtag par gyis/ /de ltar 'bar de btsal kyang der/ /khyod kyis snying po ma mthod na/ /da dung ci phyir chags tshul gyis/ /khyod ni lus
12b6(mdo 'grel): 'di srung bar byed/ /khyod kyis mi gtsang bzar mi rung/ /khrag kyang btung du mi rung la/ /rgyu lto'ang gzhib tu mi rung na/ /lus kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ /nyis na wa dang bya rgod kyi/ /zas kyi don du 'di bsrung rigs/ /mi bo cog gi lus 'di ni/ /bkol bar bya ba nyid du zad//
12b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar khyod kyis bsrungs kyang ni/ /'chi bdag brtse ba med pa yis/ /phrogs te bya dang khyir byin na/ /de cho khyod kyis ci byar yod/ /bran g.yog bkol du mi btub la/ /gos la sogs ba mi sbyin na/ /lus 'di bsnyod kyang gzhan 'gro na/ /khyed ko ci ster sha thar gso// 
13a1(mdo 'grel): 'di la gla rngan byin nas ni/ /da ni rang gi don byed chug /phan pa med pa 'di la ni/ /thams cad sbyin par ma bya'o/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i rten tsam du/ /lus la gru yi blo bzhag ste/ /sems can rnams don bsgrub ba'i phyir/ /yid bzhin gyi ni lus su bsgyur//
13a2(mdo 'grel): de ltar rang dbang yod kyis te/ /rtag tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyis/ /khro gnyer do zum yongs thong ste/ /'gro ba'i bshes dang gsong por gyis/ khri la sogs pa bab col du/ /sgra dang bcas par mi dor ro/ /sgo yang drag tu mi dbye ste/ /rtag tu gcom bskyungs dga' bar bya/ /chu skyar byi
13a3(mdo 'grel): la chom rkun dag /sgra med 'jab cing 'gro ba yis/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub pa/ /thub pas rtag tu de bzhin spyad/ /gzhan la bzhen skul 'debs mkhas shing/ /ma bcol phan par byed pa'i ngag /gus pas spyi bos blang bgyis te/ /rtag tu kun gyi slob mar gyur/ legs par
13a4(mdo 'grel): smras pa thams cad la/ /dge bar gsungs zhes brjod par bya/ /bsod nams byed pa mthong gyur na/ /bstod pas legs pa dga' ba bskyed/ /lkog na yon tan brjod bya zhing/ /yon tan brjod na rjes su brjod/ /rang gi yon tan brjod na nges/ /yon tan shes par rig par bya/ /rtsom pa thaMs cad
13a5(mdo 'grel): dga' phyir te/ /de ni rin gyis nyo na'ang dkon/ /de ltar gzhan byas yon tan gyis/ /dga' ba'i bde ba spyad par bya /bdag la 'dir gong yod med la/ /pha rol tu yang bde ba che/ /nyes pas mi dga' sdug bsngal zhing/ /pha rol tu yang sdug bsngal che/ /smra na yid phebs 'brel pa dang/
13a6(mdo 'grel): don gsal yid du 'ong ba dang/ /chags dang zhe sdang spangs pa dang/ /'jam zhing ran par smra bar bya/ /mig gis sems can lta na yang/ /'di dag nyid la brten nas bdag /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro zhes/ /drang zhing byams pa'i tshul gyis blta/ /rtag par mngon zhen
13a7(mdo 'grel): gyis bslang ba 'am/ /gnyen pa yis ni bslang ba nyid/ /yon tan dang ni phan 'dogs zhing/ /sdug bsngal can la dge chen 'gyur/ /mkhas shing dga' dang ldan byas nas/ /las rnams rtag tu bdag gis byas/ /las rnams kun la su la yang/ /bltos bar bya ba ma yin no/
13b1(mdo 'grel): sbyin ba'i pha rol phyin la sogs/ /gong nas gong du khyad zhugs spyad/ /chung du'i phyir ni che mi btang/ /gtso cher gzhan gyi don bsam mo/ /de ltar rig byas gzhan don la/ /rtag tu brtson pas gnas par bya/ /thugs rjes mnga' ba ring gzigs pas/ /bkag pa rnams kyang de la gnang/ /log par ltung dang mgon
13b2(mdo 'grel): med? dang/ /brtul zhugs gnas la bgo bya zhing/ /ran pa tsam duAng bza' bya ste/ /chos gos gsum mi gtogs pa sbyin/ /dam pa'i chos ni spyod pa'i lus/ /phran tshegs ched du gnod mi bya/ /de ltar byas na sems can gyi/ /bsam pa myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/ /snying rje'i bsam ma dag par//
13b3(mdo 'grel): lus 'di btang bar mi bya ste/ /ci nas 'di dang gzhan du yang/ /don chen sgrub pa'i rgyur btang ngo/ /ma gus pa la chos mi bshad/ /mi na bzhin du mgo dkris dang/ /gdugs dang mkhar ba mtshon thogs dang/ /mgo bo g.yogs pa dag la min/ /dman la zab dang rgya che dang//
13b4(mdo 'grel): skyes pa med par bud med min/ /dman dang mchog gi chos rnams la/ /mtshungs par gus par kun tu spyad/ /rgya chen chos kyi snod gyur pa/ /dman pa'i chos la sbyar mi bya/ /mdo dang sngags kyis 'drid mi bya/ /spyod pa'ang yongs su dor mi bya/ /so shing dang ni mchil ma dag /dor ba na ni
13b5(mdo 'grel): dag pa par bya/ /gci la sogs pa'ang longs spyod pa'i/ /chu dang thar la dor ba smad/ /kha bkang ba dang sgra bcas dang/ /kha gdangs nas ni bzang mi bya/ /rkang pa brkyang ste mi 'dug cing/ /lag pa mnyam par mi mnye'o/ /bzhon pa mal stan gnas dag tu/ /bud med gzhan dang
13b6(mdo 'grel): gcig mi bya/ 'jig rten ma dang 'gyur ba kun/ /mthong dang dris te spang bar bya/ /sor mos brda ni mi bya ste/ /gus dang bcas pa'i g.yas pa yi/ /lag pa dag ni kun gyis kyang/ /lam yang de ltar bstan par bya/ /lag pa shas cher bskyod min te/ /cung zad bskyod la
13b7(mdo 'grel): sgra bsgrags pa/ /se gol la sogs rnams bra ste/ /gzhan du ma bstams par 'gyur ro/ /mgon po mya ngan 'das gzims ltar/ /'dod pa'i phyogs su nyal bar bya/ /shes bzhin myur du ldang sems la/ /thog ma nyid du nges sbyar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa dag/ tshad
14a1(mdo 'grel): med par ni gsungs pa las/ /sems sbyang ba yi spyod pa ni/ nges par de srid spyad par bya/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /phung po gsum pa gdon bya zhing/ /rgyal dang byang chub sems brten pas/ /ltung ba'i lhag ma des zhi bya//
14a2(mdo 'grel): rang dam gzhan gyi dbang yang rung/ /gnas skabs gang du ci spyod kyang/ /bslab par gsungs pa gang yin pa'i/ /gnas skabs de la 'bad de bslab/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi mi bslab pa/ /de ni gang yang yod min te/ /de ltar gnas pa'i mkhas pa la//
14a3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /dngos sam yang na brgyud kyang rung/ /sems can don las gzhan mi spyad/ /sems can kho na'i don gyi phyir/ /thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ /theg chen don la
14a4(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i brtul zhugs mchog /srog gi phyir yang mi gtang ngo/ /dpal 'byung ba yi rnam thar las/ /bla ma bsten pa'i tshul ltar bslab/ /'di dang sangs rgyas bka' stsal gzhan/ /mdo sde bklags nas shes par bya//
14a5(mdo 'grel): mdo sde rnams las bslab pa snang/ /de bas mdo sde klag par bya/ /nam mkha' i snying po'i mdo sde ni/ /thog ma nyid du blta bar bya/ /gang phyir rtag tu spyad pa ni/ /de las rgya cher rab ston pas/ /bslab pa kun las btus pa yang/ /nges par yang
14a6(mdo 'grel): dang yang du blta/ /yang na re zhig mdor bsdus pa'i/ /mdo rnams kun las btus pa blta/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ /gnyis pa'ang 'bad pas blta bar bya/ /gang las gang ni ma bkag pa/ /de nyid spyad par bya ba ste/ /'jig rten
14a7(mdo 'grel): sems ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bslab pa mthong nas yang dag spang/ /lus dang sems kyi gnas skabs la/ /yang dang yang du brtag bya ba/ /de nyid kho na mdor na ni/ /shes bzhin bsrung ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /lus kyi 'di dag spyad par bya/ /tshig tsam brjod
14b1(mdo 'grel): bas ci zhig 'grub/ /sman dpyad bklags ba tsam gyis ni/ /nad ba dag la phan 'gyur ram/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ shes bzhin bsrung ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// // bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi/ /sbyin
14b2(mdo 'grel): dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs/ /legs spyad gang yin de dag kyang/ khong khri gcig gis 'joms? par byed/ /zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig ba med/ /bzod pa lta bu'i dka' thub med/ /de bas bzod la nan tan du/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis bsgom par
14b3(mdo 'grel): bya/ /zhe sdang zug rngu'i sems 'chang na/ /yid ni zhi ba nyams mi myong/ /dga' dang bde ba'ang mi 'thob la/ /gnyid mi 'ong zhing brtan med 'gyur/ /gang dag nor dang bkur sti yis/ /drin byin de la brten gyur ba/ /de dag kyang ni sngar ldan pa'i/ /rje
14b4(mdo 'grel): dpon de la gsod par rgol/ /de yis mdza' bshes skyo bar 'gyur/ /sbyin bas bsdus kyang sten mi byed/ /mdor na khro ba bder gnas pa/ /de ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ khro ba'i dgra yis de la sogs/ /sdug bsngal dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /gang
14b5(mdo 'grel): zhig bsgrims te khro 'joms pa/ /de ni 'di dang gzhan du bde/ /mi 'dod byas dang 'dod ba yi/ /gegs byas pa la byung gyur pa/ /yid mi bde ba'i zas rnyed nas/ /zhe sdang rtas te bdag 'joms so/ /de ltas bdag gi dgra bo de'i/ /zas ni rnam par
14b6(mdo 'grel): gzhom par bya/ /'di ltar bdag la gnod pa las/ /dgra 'di la ni las gzhan med/ /ci la bab kyang bdag gis ni/ /dga' ba'i yid ni dkrug mi bya/ /mi dga' byas kyang 'dod mi 'grub/ /dge ba dag ni nyams bar 'gyur/ /gal te bcos su
14b7(mdo 'grel): yod na ni/ /de la mi dgar ci zhig yod/ /'on te bcos su med na yang/ /de la mi dga' byas ci phan/ /bdag dang bdag gi bshes rnams la/ /sdug bsngal brnyas dang tshig rtsub dang/ /mi snyan zhes bya mi 'dod de/ /dgra la de las bzlog pas so//
15a1(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i rgyu ni res 'ga' 'byung/ /sdug bsngal rgyu ni shin tu mar/ /sdug bsngal med par nges 'byung med/ /de bas sems khyod brtan par mnos/ /dka' bzlog dad dang kar+Na pa/ /sreg dang gcod sogs tsher ba ni/ /don med pa zod byed thang
15a2(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /don du bdag go ci phyir sngar/ /goms te sla bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos de gang yang yod ma yin/ /de bas gnod pa chung goms shing/ /gnod pa chen po'i bzod par byos /sprul dang sha sbrang dag dang ni/ /bkres skom la sogs tshor ba dang/ /g.yan pa la
15a3(mdo 'grel): sogs bcas pa yi/ /don med sdug bsngal cis ma mthong/ /tsha grang char dang rlung sogs dang/ /nad dang 'ching dang rteg sogs la/ /bdag gis gze re mi bya ste/ /de ltar byas na gnod pa 'phel/ /la la bdag gi khrag mthong na/ /dpa' brtan lhag par skye 'gyur
15a4(mdo 'grel): yod/ /la la gzhan gyi khrag mthong na/ /'bog cing brgyal bar 'gyur ba yod/ /de ni sems kyi dad brtan dang/ /sngar ma'i tshul las gyur pa yin/ /de bas gnod pa khyad bsad cing/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi tshugs byos/ /mkhas pas sdug bsngal byung yang ni
15a5(mdo 'grel): sems kyi rab dang rnyog mi bya/ /nyon mongs rnams dang g.yul 'gyod la/ /g.yul 'gyed tshe na gnod pa mang/ /sdug bsngal thams cad khyad bsad nas/ /zhe sdang la sogs dgra 'joms pa/ /de dag rgyal byed dpa' bo ste/ /lhag ma rol gsod pa'o/ /gzhan yang sdug
15a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal yon tan ni/ /skyo bas dregs pa sel bar byed/ /'khor ba pa la snying rje skye/ /sdig la 'dzem dang dge la dga' / /mkhris pa la sogs sdug bsngal gyi/ /'byung gnas tshe la mi khro bar/ /sems yod rnams la ci ste khro/ /de dag kun kyang rkyen gyis
15a7(mdo 'grel): bskul/ /dper na mi 'dod bzhin du yang/ /nad ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi 'dod bzhin du yang/ /nan gyis nyon mongs 'byung bar 'gyur/ khro bar bya zhes ma bsams kyang/ /skye bo rnams ni gyi nar khro/ /bskyed bar bya zhes ma bsams kyang/ khro ba de
15b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /nyes pa ji snyed thams cad dang/ /sdig pa rnams pa sna tshogs pa/ /de kun rkyen gyi stobs las byung/ /rang dbang yod pa ma yin no/ /rkyen rnams tshogs pa de dag kyang/ /bskyed par bya zhes sems pa med/ /des bskyed de yang bdag med ces/ /sems pa
15b2(mdo 'grel): yod pa ma yin no/ /gtso bo zhes bya gang 'dod dang/ /bdag ces brtags pa gang yin pa/ /de nyid bdag ni 'byung bya zhes/ /ched du bsams shing 'byung ba med/ /ma skyes par ni de med na/ /de tshe skye bar 'dod pa gang/ /yul la rtag tu g.yengs 'gyur bas/ /'gag par 'gyur gang ma
15b3(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /ci ste bdag de rtag na ni/ /mkha' bzhin byed pa med par mngon/ /rkyen rnams gzhan dang phrad na yang/ /'gyur ba med pa ci byar yod/ /byed pa'i tshe yang sngon bzhin na/ /byed pa de la ci zhig bya/ /de yi byed pa 'di yin zhes/ /'brel bar 'gyur ba gang zhig yod//
15b4(mdo 'grel): de ltar thams cad gzhan gyi dbang/ /de yi dbang gis de dbang med/ /de ltar shes na sprul lta bu'i/ /dngos po kun la khro mi 'gyur/ /gang gis gang zhig bzlog bya ste/ /bzlog pa 'ang rigs pa min? zhe na/ /de la brten nas sdug bsngal rnams/ /rgyun chad 'gyur 'dod mi
15b5(mdo 'grel): rigs med/ /de bas dgra 'am mdza' yang rung/ /mi rigs byed pa mthong gyur na/ /'di 'dra'i rkyen las gyur to zhes/ /de ltar sems te bde bar mnos/ /gal te rang dags 'grub 'gyur na/ /'ga' yang sdug bsngal mi 'dod pas/ /lus can dag ni thams cad kyang/ /
15b6(mdo 'grel): su la'ang sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur/ /bag med pas ni bdag la'ang bdag /tsher ma la sogs gnod pa byed/ /bud med la sogs thob bya'i phyir/ /rngam zhing zas gcod la sogs byed/ kha cig 'geg cing g.yang sar mchod/ /dug dang mi 'phrod za ba dang/ /bsod nams
15b7(mdo 'grel): pa yin spyod pa yis /rang la gnod pa byed pa yod/ /gang tshe nyon mongs dbang gyur pas/ /bdag sdug nyid kyang gnod byed na/ /de tshe de dag gzhan lus la/ /gnod mi byed par ji ltar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs skyes pa de lta bur/ /bdag gsod la sogs zhugs pa la/ /snying rje brgya
16a1(mdo 'grel): lam skyes na/ khro bar 'gyur bci'i tha tshig /gal te gzhan la 'tshe byed pa/ /byis pa rnams kyi rang bzhin na/ /de la khro bar mi rigs te/ /sreg pa'i rang bzhin me bkon 'dra/ /'on te skyon de glo bur la/ /sems can rang bzhin des las na/ /
16a2(mdo 'grel): 'o na 'ang khro bar mi rigs te/ /mkha' la du 'thul dkon pa bzhin/ /dbyug pa la sogs dngos bkol te/ /gal te 'phen pa la khro na/ /de yang zhe sdang gis spang bas/ /nyis na zhe sdang la khro rigs/ /bdag gis sngon chad sems can la/ /'di 'dra ba yi gnod ba byas//
16a3(mdo 'grel): de bas sems can 'tshe byed pa/ /bdag la gnod pa 'di 'byung rigs se/ /de yi mtshon dang bdag gi lus/ /gnyis ka'ang sdug bsngal rgyu yin te/ /des mtshon bdag gi lus phyung na/ /gang zhig la ni khro bar bya/ /shub mi yi gzugs 'dra ba/ /reg tu mi bzod sdug
16a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal can/ /sred ldongs bdag gis bzung gyur na/ /de la gnod pa su la khro/ /byis pa sdug bsngal mi 'dod cing/ /sdug bsngal rgyu la brkam pas na/ /rang gi nyes bas gnod gyur pas/ /gzhan la bkon du ci zhig yod/ /dper na dmyal ba'i srung ma dang/ /ral gri
16a5(mdo 'grel): lo ma'i nags tshal ltar/ /rang gi las kyis 'di bskyed na/ /gang zhig la ni khro bar bya/ /bdag gi las kyi bskul byas nas/ /bdag la gnod byed rnams 'byung ste/ /de yis sems can dmyal dod na/ /bdag gis de dag ma brlag gam/ /'di dag la ni brten bcas
16a6(mdo 'grel): nas/ /bzod pas bdag sdig mang du 'byad/ /bdag la brten nas de dag ni/ /yun ring sdug bsngal dmyal bar 'dod/ /bdag ni de la gnod byed la/ /de dag bdag la phan 'dogs na/ /phyin ci log tu ci yi phyir/ /ma rungs sems khyod khro bar byed/ /gal te bdag la
16a7(mdo 'grel): bsam pa yi/ /yon tan yod na dmyal mi 'gro/ /gal te bdag gis bdag bsrungs na/ /de dag la 'dir ci zhig 'byung/ /'on te lan du gnod byas na/ /de dag bsrungs par ma gyur la/ /bdag gi spyod pa'ang nyams par 'gyur/ /des na dka' thub zhig bar 'gyur//
16b1(mdo 'grel): yid? ni lus can ma yin pas/ /sus kyang gang duAng gzhom mi nus/ /lus la mngon par zhen pas na/ /lus 'di sdug bsngal dag gis gnod/ /brnyas dang tshig rtsub smra ba dang/ /mi snyan pa yi tshig de yis/ /lus la gnod par mi 'gyur na/ /sems khyod ci phyir rab tu khro/ /gzhan
16b2(mdo 'grel): dag bdag la mi dga' ba/ /des ni tshe 'di 'am tshe gzhan la/ /bdag la za bar mi byed na/ /bdag ni ci phyir de mi 'dod/ /rnyed pa'i bar chad byed pa'i phyir/ /gal te 'di bdag mi 'dod na/ /bdag gi rnyed pa 'di 'dor gyi/ /sdig pa dag ni brtan par gnas/ /bdag ni der
16b3(mdo 'grel): nyid shi yang bla'o/ /log 'tsho yun ring gson mi rung/ /bdag lta yun ring gnas gyur kyang/ /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal de nyid yin/ /rmi lam lo brgyar bde myong nas/ /sad par gyur pa gang yin dang/ /gzhan zhig yud tsam bde myong nas/ /sad par gyur pa gang yin pa/ /sad pa de
16b4(mdo 'grel): dag gnyi ga la'ang/ /bde ba de ni phyir 'ong med/ /tshe ring tshe thung gnyi ga yang/ /'chi ba'i dus na de 'drar zad/ /rnyed pa mang po thob gyur te/ /yun ring dus su bde spyad kyang/ /chom pos phrogs pa ji bzhin du/ /sgren mo lag pa stong par 'gro/ /gal te rnyed pas gson gyur na//
16b5(mdo 'grel): sdig zad bsod nams bya zhe na/ /rnyed pa'i don du khros gyur na/ /bsod nams zang sdig mi 'gyur ram/ /gang gi don du bdag gson pa/ /de nyid ga la te nyams gyur na/ /sdig pa 'ba' zhig byed pa yi/ /gson pa des ko ci zhig bya/ /gal te sems can nyams byed pas//
16b6(mdo 'grel): mi snyan smra la khro zhe na/ /gzhan la mi snyan brjod la'ang khyod/ /de bzhin ci ste khro mi byed/ /ma dang gzhan la rag las pas/ /dad pa med la khyod bzod na/ /nyon mongs skye la rag las pa'i/ /mi snyan smra la cis mi bzod/ /sku gzugs mchod rten dam chos la/ /'khyal zhing
16b7(mdo 'grel): 'jig par byed pa la'ang/ /bdag gis zhe sdang mi rigs te/ /sangs rgyas sogs la gnod mi mnga' / /bla ma gnyen la sogs pa dang/ /bshes la gnod pa byed rnams la'ang/ /snga ma'i tshul gyis rkyen dag las/ /'gyur bar mthong nas khro ba bzlog /lus can rnams la 
17a1(mdo 'grel): sems yod dang/ /sems med gnyis kas gnod byed na/ /sems yod ci ste bkar te bkon/ /de bas gnod pa bzod par gyis/ /la la rmongs pas nyes pa byed/ /la la rmongs te khros gyur na/ /de la skyon med gang gis bya/ /skyon dang bcas/
17a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig yin/ /gang gis gzhan dag gnod byed pa'i/ /las de sngon chad ci phyir byas/ /thams cad las la 'og? las na bdag gis 'di la ci ste bkon/ /de ltar mthong nas ci nas kyang/ /thams cad phan tshun byams sems su/ /'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis ni/ /bsod nams dag la
17a3(mdo 'grel): bsgrims te bya/ /dper na khyim tshig gyur pa'i me? khyim gzhan zhig tu song nas ni/ /rtswa sogs gang la mched byed pa/ /de ni phyung ste dor ba yin/ /de bzhin gang la sems chags nas/ /zhe sdang me ni mched gyur pa/ /bsod nams tshigs par dogs pa yis/ /de ni de yi
17a4(mdo 'grel): mong la dor/ /bsad pa'i mi zhig lag bcad de/ /gal te thar na cis ma legs/ /gal de mi yi sdug bsngal gyis/ /dmyal ba bral na cis ma legs/ /da lta'i sdug bsngal 'di tsam la'ang/ /bdag gis bzod bar mi nus na/ /des na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rgyu//
17a5(mdo 'grel): khro ba ci ste bzlog mi byed/ /'dod pa'i don du bsreg la sogs/ /dmyal bar stong phrag myos gyur kyang/ /bdag gis rang gi don dang ni/ /gzhan gyi don kyang ma byas so/ /'di ni de tsam gnod mig la/ /don chen dag kyang 'grub 'gyur bas/ /'gro ba'i gnod sel sdug
17a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal la/ /dga' ba 'ba' zhig 'dir bya rigs/ /gzhan gyi yon tan ldan bstong nas/ /gal te dga' ba'i bde thob na/ /yid khyod kyang ni de bstod nas/ /ci phyi de ltar dga' mi byed/ /khyod kyi dga' ba'i bde ba 'di/ /bde 'byung kha na ma tho med/ /yon tan ldan pa
17a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis gnang/ /gzhan sdud pa yi mchog kyang yin/ /gzhan yang de ltar bde 'gyur zhes/ /gal te khyod bde 'di mi 'dod/ /gla ngan sbyin sogs spangs pa'i phyir/ /mthod dang ma mthong nyams par 'gyur/ /rang gi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe/ /gzhan la'ang bde ba 'dod
17b1(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /gzhan gyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe/ /rang la'ang bde ba mi 'dod byed/ /sems can thams cad bde 'dod pas/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /sems can rang gis bde rnyed nas/ /dko ci ste khro bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum mchod 'tshang rgya bar/ /sems can rnams ni 'dod ce na/ /bsnyen?
17b2(mdo 'grel): bkur dan don tsam mthong nas/ /de phyir de la gdung par byed/ /gso bya gang zhig khyod gso ba/ /khyod nyid kyis ni sbyin bya de/ /gnyen gyis 'tsho ba rnyed gyur na/ /dgar mi 'gyur bar slar khro 'am/ /ci ste 'gro la mi 'dod na/ /de la byang chub 'dod gang yin/ /gang zhig gzhan 'byor khro de la/ /byang
17b3(mdo 'grel): chub sems ni ga la yod/ /gal te des de la rnyed dam/ /sbyin bdag khyim na gnas gyur pa/ /kun tu de khyod la med na/ /byin ma byin rung des ci bya/ /bsod nams dang ni dad pa 'am/ /rang gi yon tan ci phyir 'dod/ /rnyed par gyur pa mi 'dzin la/ /gang gis khro bar mi byed smros/ /khyod ni rang
17b4(mdo 'grel): gis sdig byas la/ /mya ngan med par ma zad kyi/ /bsod nams byas pa gzhan dag dang/ /lhan cig 'gran par byed 'dod dam// //bam po gnyis pa/ /gal te dgra zhig mi dga' na'ang/ /de la khyod dgar ci zhig yod/ /khyod kyi yid smon tsam gyis ni /de la gnod pa'i
17b5(mdo 'grel): rgyur mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyi 'dod pas sdug bsngal de/ /grub na'ang khyod dgar ci zhig yod/ /gal te 'tshangs par 'gyur zhe na/ /de las phung ba 'ang gzhan ci yod/ /nyon mongs nya pas btab pa yi/ /mchil pa 'di ni mi bzang gze/ /des bzung sems dmyal bum bar yang/ /dmyal ba'i srung
17b6(mdo 'grel): mas bdag 'tshed des/ /bstod dang grags pa'i rim gro ni/ /bsod nams mi 'gyur cher mi 'gyur/ /bdag stobs mi 'gyur nad med min/ /lus bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag ni rang don shes gyur na/ /de la rang don ci zhig yod/ /yid bde 'ba' zhig 'dod na ni/ /rgyan sogs chad
17b7(mdo 'grel): yang bsten dgos so/ /grags ba'i don du nor? gtong zhing/ /bdag nyid kyang ni gsod byed na/ /tshig 'bru rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ /shi na des ko su la bde/ /bye ma'i khang bu rdib gyur na/ /byis pa rnams ni ga chad du/ /de bzhin bstod dang grags nyams na/ /rang gi sems ni bris pa bzhin//
18a1(mdo 'grel): re zhig dgra la sems med phyir/ /bdag la bstod sems yod mi srid/ /bdag la gzhan dga' zhes grags pa/ /de ni dga' ba'i rgyu yin grang/ /gzhan nam yang na bdag la'ang rung/ /gzhan dga' bdag la ci zhig phan/ /dga' ba de ni de nyid kyi/ /bdag gis
18a2(mdo 'grel): de las shas mi thob/ /de bde ba yis bdag bde na/ /kun la'ang de bzhin bya dgos na/ /ci phyir gzhan la dga' ba yis/ /bde bar byung na bdag mi bde/ /de bas bdag ni bstod do zhes/ /rang gi dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ /de yang de ltar mi 'thad pas/ /byis pa'i spyod pa kho nar zad//
18a3(mdo 'grel): bstod sogs bdag ni ga yeng bar byed/ /des ni skyo ba'ang 'jig par byed/ /yon tan ldan la phrag dog dang/ /phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'jig par byed/ /de phyir bdag gis bstod sogs ni/ /gzhig phyir gang dag nyer gnas pa/ /de dag bdag ni ngan song du/ /ltung ba bsrung phyir
18a4(mdo 'grel): zhugs min nam/ /bdag ni grol ba don gnyer la/ /rnyed dang bkur sti 'ching mi dgos/ gang dag bdag bcing grol byed pa/ /de la bdag ni ji ltar khro/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal 'jug 'dod la/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni byin brlabs bzhin/ /mi gtong sgo 'phar nyid gyur pa/ /de la bdag
18a5(mdo 'grel): ni ji ltar khro/ /'di ni bsod nams gegs byed ces/ /de la'ang khro ba rigs min te/ /bzod mtshungs dka' thub yod min na/ /bdag ni de la mi gnas sam/ /gal te bdag ni rang skyon gyis/ /'di la bzod pa mi byed na/ /bsod nams rgyur ni nyer gnas pa/ /'di la bdag gegs
18a6(mdo 'grel): byed par zad/ /gang zhig gang med mi 'byung la/ /gang zhig yod na yod gyur pa/ /de nyid de yi rgyu yin na/ /ji ltar de la gegs zhes bya/ /dus su phyin pa'i slong mo pas/ /sbyin pa'i gegs byas yod ma yin/ /rab tu 'byin par byed gyur pa/ /rab byung gegs zhes byar mi rung/ /'jig
18a7(mdo 'grel): rten na ni slong ba mod/ /gnod pa byed pa dkon pa ste/ /'di ltar phar gnod ma byas nas/ /'ga' yang gnod pa mi byed do/ /de bas dal bsam bsgrubs pa'i/ /khyim du gter ni byung ba ltar/ /byang chub spyod pa'i grogs gyur pas/ /bdag gis dgra la dga' bar bya/ /'di
18b1(mdo 'grel): dang bdag gis bsgrubs pas na/ /de phyir bzod pa'i 'bras bu 'di/ /'di la thog mar bdar 'os te/ /'di ltar de ni bzod pa'i rgyu/ /gal te bzod bsgrub bsam med pas/ /dgra 'di mchod bya min zhe na/ /'grub pa yi ni rgyur rung pa'i/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ci ste mchod/ /gal te dgra
18b2(mdo 'grel): 'di gnod bya yi/ /bsam yod mchod bya min zhe na/ /sman pa bzhin du phan brtson na/ /bdag gis bzod pa'ang ji ltar 'grub/ /de bas rab tu sdang sems la/ /brten nas bzod par skye bas na/ /de nyid bzod pa'i rgyu yin pas/ /dam pa'i chos bzhin byed par 'os/ /de phyir sems
18b3(mdo 'grel): can zhing dang ni/ /rgyal ba'i zhing zhes thub pas gsungs/ /'di dag mgu byas mang po zhig /'di ltar phun tshogs pha rol phyin/ /sems can rnams dang rgyal ba las/ /sangs rgyas chos 'grub 'dra ba la/ /rgyal la gus bya de bzhin du/ /sems can la min ci yi tshul/ /bsam pa'i yon
18b4(mdo 'grel): tan rang gis min/ /'bras bu las yin de mtshungs par/ /sems can rnams la'ang yon tan yod/ /de phyir de dag mnyam pa yin/ /byams sems ldan la mchod pa gang/ /de ni sems can che ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas dad pa'i bsod nams gang/ /de yang sangs rgyas che ba nyid/ /sangs
18b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas chos 'grub cha yod pa/ /des na de dag mnyam par 'dod/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mdza' yas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang 'ga' mi mnyam/ /yon tan mchog tshogs gcig pu yi/ /yon tan shas tsam 'ga' zhig la/ /snang na'ang de la mchod don du/ /khams gsum phul yang chungs
18b6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos mchog skye pa'i shas/ /sems can rnams la'ang yod pas na/ /'di tsam zhig gis cha bstun nas/ /sems can mchod dbyar rigs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang g.yo med gnyen gyur cing/ /phan pa dpag med mdzad rnams la/ /sems can mgu bya ma gtogs ba//
18b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan gang zhig gis lan yon 'gyur/ /gang phyir sku gtong mnar med 'jug pa la/ /de la phan btags lan lon 'gyur bas na/ /de bas 'di dag nod chen byed na yang/ /thams cad bzad ma bu zhig du spyad par bya/ /re zhig bdag gi rten gyur nyid kyang ni/ /gang phyir rang gi sku la'ang mi gzigs pa//
19a1(mdo 'grel): de la rmongs pa bdag gis ji ltar na/ /nga rgyal bya zhing bran gyi dngos mi bya/ /gang dag bde bas thub rnams dgyes 'gyur zhing/ /gang la gnod na mi dgyes 'byung 'gyur ba/ de dag dga' bas thub dbang kun dgyes shing/ /de la gnod byas thugs gnod pa bya ba
19a2(mdo 'grel): ji ltar lus la kun nas me 'bar ba/ /'dod ba kun gyis yid bder mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin sems can gnod pa byas na yang/ thugs rje che rnams dgyes pa'i thabs med do/ /de bas bdag gi 'gro ba gnod byas pas/ /thugs rje che kun mi dgyes gyur pa gang/ /sdig de de ring so sor?
19a3(mdo 'grel): bshags bgyi yis/ /mi dgyes gang lags de kun bzod par gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dgyes par bgyi slad du/ /deng nas des bzung 'jig rten bran du mchi/ /'gro mang rtog pas bdag gi spyi tshogs gang?/ /'gums kyang mi steng 'jig rten mgon dgyes mdzod/ /
19a4(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i dkun thugs rje'i bdag can des/ /bdag tu mdzad pa 'di la the tshom med/ sems can ngo bor mthong ba 'di dag nyid/ /mgon de'i bdag nyid ci phyir gus mi byed/ /'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byed yin/ /rang don yang dag sgrub pa'ang 'di nyid do/ /'jig rten sdug
19a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal sel ba'ang 'di nyid de/ /de ltas bdag gis rtag tu de nyid bya/ /dper na rgyal po'i mi 'ga' zhig/ skye bo mang la gnod byed kyang/ /skye bo mig rgyang ring po dag /nus kyang phyir gnod mi byed de/ /'di ltar de gcig ma yin gyi/ /rgyal po'i stobs ni de yi dpung/ /de bzhin gnod
19a6(mdo 'grel): byed nyam chung ba/ /'ga' yang khyad du gsad mi byed/ 'di ltar dmyal ba'i srungs na dang/ /thugs rje ldan rnams de yi dpung/ /ji ltar dmangs kyis rgyal gtum bzhin/ /sems can rnams ni mgu bar bya/ /rgyal po lta zhig khros na yang/ /sems can mi mgu byas pa yis/ /myong bar
19a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ /dmyal pa'i gnod pa des byed dam/ rgyal po lta zhig mgu na yang/ /sems can mgu bar byas pa yis/ /thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid sbyin mi srid do/ /sems can mgu las byung ba yis/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub lta zhog /tshe 'di nyid la
19b1(mdo 'grel): 'od dpal chen dang/ /grags dang skyad? 'gyur cis ma mthong/ /'khor tshe bzod pas mdzes sogs dang/ /nad med pa dang grags pa dang/ /shin tu yun ring 'tsho ba dang/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i bde rgyas 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ /bzod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u
19b2(mdo 'grel): drug pa'o// //de ltar bzod pas brtson 'grus brtsam/ /'di ltar brtson la byang chub gnas/ /rlung med g.yo ba med pa bzhin/ /bsod nams brtson 'grus med mi 'byung/ /brtson gang dge la spro ba'o/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs bshad na/ /le kho? ngan la zhen pa dang/ /sgyid lug bdag nyid
19b3(mdo 'grel): brnyas pa'o/ /snyoms las bdo ba'i ro myang dang/ /gnyis la brten pa'i sred? pa yis/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi skyo las/ /le lo nges par skye bar 'gyur/ nyon mongs rgya pas bshor nas ni/ /skye ba'i rgyad ni chung gyur nas/ /'chi bdag khang ni song gyur ba/ /ci ste da dung mi shes sam/ /rang sde rim gyis gsod
19b4(mdo 'grel): pa yang/ khyod kyis mthong bar ma gyur tam/ /'on kyang gnyin la brten pa gang/ /gdol pa dang ni ma he bzhin/ /lam ni kun nas bkag nas su/ /'chi bdag gis ni bltas bzhin du/ /ji ltar khyod ni za dga' zhing/ /'di ltar gnyid log ji ltar dga' / /myung ba nyid du 'chi 'gyur bas/ /ji srid du
19b5(mdo 'grel): ni tshogs bsags bya/ /de tshe le lo spangs kyang ni/ /dus ma yin par ci zhig bya/ /'di ni ma byas brtsams pa dang/ /'di byed byas par gnas pa la/ /blo bur 'chi bdag 'ongs nas ni/ /kyi hud bcom zhes sems par 'gyur/ /mya ngan shugs kyis sbrangs pa yi/ /mig dmar gdong la mchi ma
19b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzag/ nye du re thag chad pa dang/ /gshin rje'i po nya bzhin la blta/ /rang sdig dran pas gdungs pa dang/ /dmyal ba'i sgra ni thos ba yis/ /skrag pas mi gtsang lus gos shing/ /myos par gyur che ci zhig bya/ /khyod ni nya gsan 'dre ba lta'o/ /tshe 'di'i 'jigs dang ldan gyur na/ /sdig byas
19b7(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni smos ci dgos/ /chu tshan gyis ni reg pa na/ /gzhon sha can la rab tsha ba'i/ /dmyal ba yis na lngas byas nas/ /ci phyir 'di? ltar bde bar gnas/ kha? rtson med zhugs bu 'dod pa dang/ /gze de can la gnod mang zhing/ /'chi bas bzung zhing lha
20a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba/ /kyi hud sdug bsngal dag gis bcom/ /mi yi gru la brten nas su/ /sdug bsngal chu bo che las grol/ /gru 'di phyi nas rnyed dka' bas/ /rmongs pa dus su gnyid ma log /dga' ba'i rgyu ni mdza' yas pa'i/ /dam chos dga' ba'i mchog spangs nas/ /sdug
20a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal rgyu yi g.yengs pa dang/ /rgod sogs la khyod ci phyid dga' / /sgyid lug med dang dpung tshogs la/ /lhur blang bdag nyid dbang bya dang/ /bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa dang/ /bdag dang gzhan du brdze bar gyis/ /bdag gis byang chub ga la zhes/ /sgyid lug par ni mi bya ste/ /'di ltar de bzhin
20a3(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa ni/ /bden pa gsungs bas bden 'di gsungs/ /sbrang bu sha sprang bung ba dang/ de bzhin srin bur gang gyur pa /des kyang brtson pa'i stobs bskyed na/ /byang chub thob dka' bla med thob/ /bdag lta rigs kyi ming skyos la/ /phan dang gnod pa'i ngo shes pas/ /byang chub spyod pa ma
20a4(mdo 'grel): btang na/ /bdag gis byang chub cis mi mthong/ /'on te rkang lag la sogs pa/ /btang dgos bdag ni 'jigs shes na/ /lci dang yang ba ma dpyad par/ /rmongs pas bdag ni 'jigs par zad/ /bskal ba bye ba grangs med du/ /lan grangs du mang bcas pa na/ /dbugs dang sreg
20a5(mdo 'grel): dang gsheg 'gyur gyis/ /byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis byang chub bsgrub pa yi/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni tshod yod de/ /zug rngus khong brlag gnod pas la phyir/ /lus rma btod pa'i sdug bsngal bzhin/ /sman pa kun kyang gso dpyad kyis/ /mi bde ba yis nad med byed/ /
20a6(mdo 'grel): de pas sdug bsngal mang po dag /gzhom phyir mi bde chung bzod bya/ /gso dpyad phal pa 'di 'dra ba/ /sman pa mchog gis ma mdzad de/ /cho ga shin tu 'jam pa yis/ /nang chen dpag med gso bar mdzad/ /tshod ma la sogs sbyin pa la'ang/ /'dren pas thog mar sbyor bar mdzad//
20a7(mdo 'grel): de la goms nas phyi nas ni/ /rim gyis rang gi sha yang gtong/ /gang tshe rang gi lus la ni/ /tshong sogs lta bu'i blo skyes pa/ /de tshe sha la sogs gtong pa/ /de la dka' ba ci zhig yod/ /sdig pa spang phyir sdug bsngal med/ /mkhas pa'i phyir na mi dga' med/ 'di ltar lon
20b1(mdo 'grel): par rtog pa dang/ /sdig pas lus dang sems la gnod/ /bsod nams kyis ni lus bde la /mkhas pa yis ni sems bde ma /gzhan don 'khor bar gnas kyang ni/ /snying rje can dag ci ste skyo/ /'di ni byang chub sems stobs kyis/ /sngon? gyi sdig pa zang byed cing/ /bsod nams
20b2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho sdud byed phyir/ /nyan thos rnams las mchog tu bshad/ /de bas skyo ral kun sel ba'i/ /byang chub sems kyi rta zhon nas/ /bde nas bde bar 'gro ba la/ /sems shes su zhig sgyid lug 'gyur/ /sems can don sgrub bya phyir dpung/ /mos brtan dga' dang dor ba yin/ /mos pa
20b3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal 'jigs pa dang/ /de yi phan yon bsams pas skyed/ /de ltar mi mthun phyogs spangs te/ /mos dang nga rgyal dga' dang dor/ /lhur blang dbang bsgyur stobs kyis ni/ /brtson 'grus spel phyir 'bad par bya/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi nyes pa ni/ /dpag med bdag gis gzhom bya ste/
20b4(mdo 'grel): gang du nyes pa re re la'ang/ /bskal pa rgya mtshos zang 'gyur ba/ /nyes zad rtsom pa de yi ni/ /cha yang bdag la ma mthong na/ /sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i snod/ /bdag go ci steng snying ma gas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis yon tan ni/ /mang po bdag gis bsgrub bya ste/ /de la
20b5(mdo 'grel): yon tan re re yang/ /bskal pa rgya mtshos goms gyur na/ /bdag gis yon tan cha la yang/ /gom spa nam yang ma skyes te/ /ji zhig ltar rnyed skye ba yang/ /bdag gis don med byas pa tshar/ /bdag gis bcom ldan ma mchod cing/ /dga' ston chen po'i bde ma byin
20b6(mdo 'grel): bstan la bya ba ma byas dang/ /dbul po'i bsam pa rdzogs ma byas/ /'jigs la mi 'jigs ma byin dang/ /nyam thag bde ma byas na bdag /ma yi mngal gyi zug rngu dang/ /sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bskyed par zad/ /bdag ni sngon chad de ltar yang/ /tshos la mos
20b7(mdo 'grel): dang? bral ba yis/ /phongs pa 'di 'drar byung gyur na/ /su zhig chos la mos pa gtong/ /dge ba'i phyogs ni thams cad kyis/ /rtsa ba mos pa thub pas gsungs/ /de'i yang rtsa ba rtag tu ni/ /rnam smin 'bras bu bsgom pas so/ /sdug bsngal yid mi bde ba dang/ /
21a1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /'dod pa rnams dang 'bral ba ni/ /sdig pa spyod las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yid la bsams pa'i dge byas pas/ /gang dang gang du 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de dang der ni bsod nams des/ /'bras bu yon gyis mngon mchod
21a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /sdig pa byed pa bde 'dod kyang/ /gang dang gang du 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de dang der ni sdig pa des/ /sdug bsngal mtshon gyis rnam par 'joms/ /rgya che dri bzang bsil pa'i pad+ma'i snying por gnas/ /rgyal ba'i gsung snyan zas kyis gzi brjid bskyed byas pa/ /thub 'od kyi rgyas
21a3(mdo 'grel): pad+ma las byung lus mchog can/ /rgyal ba'i mdun gnas bde gshegs sras su dge bas 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i skyes bus dpags pa ma lus bshus pas shin tu nyam thag cing/ /rab tu tsha ba'i me yis bzhus pa'i zangs zhun lus la glugs gyur la/ /'bar ba'i ral gri
21a4(mdo 'grel): mdung thung gis bsnun sha yi dum bu brgyad lhags shing/ /shin tu 'bar ba'i lcags kyis gzhi ltung bar mi dge mang pos 'gyur/ /de bas dge la mos bya zhing/ /gus pa nyid bu bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan cho ga yis/ /brtsams nas nga rgyal bsgom par bya/ /dang po
21a5(mdo 'grel): 'byor pa rtags nas ni/ /brtsams 'am yang na mi brtsam bya/ /ma brtsams pa ni mchog yin gyi/ /brtsams nas ldog par mi bya'o/ /skye ba gzhan du de goms shing/ /sdig dang sdug bsngal 'phel mi 'gyur/ /gzhan dang 'bras bu'i dus kyang ni/ /dman 'gyur de 
21a6(mdo 'grel): yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /lam dang nyon mongs nus pa ste/ /gsum po dag la nga rgyal bya/ /bdag nyid gcig bus bya'o zhes/ /'di ni las kyi nga rgyal nyid/ /nyon mongs dbang med 'jig rten 'dis/ /rang don bsgrub par mi nus pas/ /'gro bas bdag ltar mi
21a7(mdo 'grel): nus te/ /de bas bdag gis 'di bya'o/ /gzhan dag dman pa'i las byed na/ /bdag nyid kyang ni ji ltar 'dug /nga rgyal gyis ni mi byed de/ /bdag la nga rgyal med pa mchog /shi ba'i sbrul dang phrad gyur na/ /khwa yang mkha' lding lta bur spyod/ /gal te bdag nyid
21b1(mdo 'grel): nyam chung na/ /ltung ba chung nguAng gnod pa byed/ /zhum bcas rtsol ba dor ba la/ /phongs las thar ba yod dam ci/ /nga rgyal rtsol ba bskyed pas ni/ /chen po yis kyang thub pa dka' / /de bas sems ni brtan pa yi/ /ltung ba rnams ni gzhom pa ste/ /bdag ni ltung bas pham byas te/ /
21b2(mdo 'grel): khams gsum rgyal 'dod bzhang gang 'gyur/ /bdag gis kun las rgyal bya ste/ /bdag las su yang rgyal mi bya/ /rgyal ba seng ge'i sras dag pas/ /nga rgyal 'di la gnas par bya/ /'gro gang nga rgyal gyis bcom de/ /nyon mongs nga rgyal can ma yin/ /nga rgyal can dgra'i dbang
21b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'gro/ /de dag nga rgyal dgra dbang gyur/ /nyon mongs nga rgyal gyis khengs na/ /ngan 'gror nga rgyal gyis khrid ci/ /mi yi dga' ston bcom pa dang/ /gzhan gyi zan za'i bran dang ni/ /glen pa mi sdug nyam chung dang/ /thams cad du ni brnyas par 'gyur/ /nga rgyal gyis khengs dka' 
21b4(mdo 'grel): thub can/ /de yang nga rgyal can gtogs na/ /dman pa ci 'dra yin pa smos/ /gang zhig nga rgyal dgra las rgyal phyir nga rgyal 'chang/ /de nyid nga rgyal can dang rnam rgyal dpa' de nyid/ /gang zhig nga rgyal dgra bdo ba yang nges bcom ste/ /'gro la 'dod bzhin rgyal ba'i 'bras bu
21b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par byed/ /nyon mongs phyogs kyi khrod gnas na/ /rnam pa stong du bsran gzugs te/ /wa la sogs pa'i seng ge bzhin/ /nyon mongs phyogs kyis mi tshugs bya/ /nyam nga che thang byung gyur kyang/ /mi yis mig ni srung pa ltar/ /de bzhin nyam du byung gyur kyang/ /
21b6(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs dbang du mi 'gyur bya/ /bdag ni bsregs te bsang gyur tam/ /bdag gi mgo bo bcad kyang bla/ /rnam pa kun tu nyon mongs pa'i/ /dgra la 'dud par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gnas skabs thams cad du/ /rigs pa las ni gzhan mi spyad/ /rtsed mo'i bde 'bras
21b7(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa ltar/ /'di yis byas pa'i las gang yin/ /las de la ni zhin bya ste/ /las nges mi ngoms dga' bar bya/ /bde ba'i don du las byas kyang/ /bde 'gyur mi 'gyur ba/? tol med kyi/ /gang gi las nyid bde 'gyur ba/ /de las mi byed ji ltar bde/ /spu gri'i song? chags
22a1(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi lta'i/ /'dod pa rnams kyis mi ngoms na/ /rnam smin bde la? ne pa yi/ /bsod nams gyis lta ci ste 'oms?/ /de ltas las char phyin bya'i phyir/ /nyi ma phyang dus gsungs pa yi/ /grub chen mtsho byung 'tsho ba 'jug lta ba/ /las de la ni 'jug
22a2(mdo 'grel): par byed pa stobs nyams pa dang rjes 'brel na/ /slab bya'i?  don du dor bar bya/ /legs par zin na'ang phyi ma dang/ /phyi ma 'dod pas de spang bya/ /'thab snying dgra? dang ltan cig tu g.yul dong? rel ga ltags pa bzhin/ /nyon mongs mtshon las bzung bya zhing/ /nyon mongs dgra
22a3(mdo 'grel): rnams 'jebs? par btag/ g.yul du ral gri lhun gyur na/ /'jigs par myur du lon pa ltar/ /de bzhin dran pa'i mtshon shor na/ /dmyal ba'i 'jigs dran myur du blang/ /ji ltar khrag lag rten bcas nas/ /dug gis lus la khyab 'gyur pa/ /de bzhin glags ni rnyed gyur
22a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /nyes pas sams la khyab par 'gyur/ nyungs mar 'kang ba'i snod bkur la/ /ral gri thogs nas drung ba sdang ste/ /po na gsong bsdigs 'jigs pa ltar/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de bzhin bsgrim/ /de pas pad du sbrul 'ongs na/ /ji ltar rings par ldang ba ltar/ /de bzhin
22a5(mdo 'grel): gnyid dang snyom 'ongs na/ /myur du de dag bzlog par bya/ /nyes pa byung ba re re zhing/ /bdag la smad nas ci nas kyang/ /bdag la phyi 'di mi 'byung ba/ /de ltar bya zhes yun ring bsam/ /ji ltar gnas skabs 'di dag la /dran pa goms pa nyid 'gyur zhes/ /rgyu 'di yis ni phrad
22a6(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ /rigs pa'i las ni 'dod par bya/ /ci nas las byed sngon rol nas/ /thams cad la ni mthu yod pa/ /de ltar bag yod btam dran te/ /bdag gis ldang ba yang bar bya/ /ji ltar rlung ni 'gro ba dang/ /'ong bas shing ba la dbang sgyur pa/ /de bzhin spro bas dbang sgyar to
22a7(mdo 'grel): de lta na ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod la 'jug pa las/ /brtson 'grus bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// //de ltar brtson 'grus bskyed nas ni/ /yid ni ting nge 'dzin la gzhag /sems ni rnam par g.yengs pa'i mi//
22b1(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs mche ba'i phrag ni gnas/ /lus so dang sems ni dben pa yis/ /rnam par g.yeng ba mi 'byung ngo/ /de bas sdug bsngal spang bya zhing/ /rnam par rtog pa'ang yongs su ngor/ /chags pa'i phyir dang rnyed sogs la/ /sred pas 'jig rten mi spongs te/ /de bas 'di dag yongs spongs la
22b2(mdo 'grel): mkhas pas 'di ltar dpyad par bya/ /zhig nas rab tu ldan pa'i lhag mthong gi/ nyon mongs rnam par 'joms par shes byas nas/ /thog mar zhi gnas btsal byed yang ni/ /'jig rten chags pa med la mngon dags 'grub/ /mi rtags su zhig mi rtag la/ yang dag chags par
22b3(mdo 'grel): byed pa yod/ /de ni tshe rabs stong dag tu/ /sdug pa mthong bar yod mi 'gyur/ /ma mthong na ni dgar mi 'gyur/ /yid kyang mnyam 'jog mi 'gyur la/ /mthong yod ngoms par mi 'gyur bas/ /sngar bzhin sred pas gdung par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la chags byas na//
22b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag nyid la kun nas sgrib/ /skyo ba'i sems kyang 'jig par byed/ /tha mar mya ngan gdud par 'gyur/ /de la sems pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /tshe 'di don med 'da' bar 'gyur/ /rtag pa med pa'i mdza' bshes kyis/ /g.yung drung chos kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /byis dang skal
22b5(mdo 'grel): ba mnyam spyod na/ /nges par ngan 'gror 'gro 'gyur te/ /skal mi mnyam par khrid byed na/ /byis pa brten pas ci zhig bya/ /skad cig gcig gis mdzad 'gyur la/ /yung tsam zhig gi dgrar yang 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i gnas pa khro byed pas/ /so so'i skye bo mgu bar dka' / /phan par
22b6(mdo 'grel): smras na khro bar byed/ /bdag kyang phan las bzlog par byed/ /de dag dag ni ma mnyam na/ /khros pas ngan 'gror 'dod bar 'gyur/ /mthol phrag dog mnyam la 'gran/ /dma' la nga rgyal bstong na dregs/ /mi snyan brjod na khong khro skyed/ /nam zhig byis las phan pa thob/ /byis
22b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'grogs na byis pa la/ /bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang/ /'khor bar dga' ba'i gtam la sogs/ /mi dge ces? kyang nges par 'byung/ /de ltar bdag dang gzhan bsten pa/ /des ni phung par 'gyur bar zad/ /des kyang dag don ma byas la/ /bdag kyang de don mi 'gyur
23a1(mdo 'grel): bas/ /byis las thag ring 'byol bar bya/ /phrad na dga' bas mgu byas te/ /'dris chen nyid du mi 'gyur bas/ /tha mal pa tsam legs par bya/ /bung bas me tog sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /chos kyi don tsam brangs nas ni/ /kun la sngon chad ma mthong bzhin//
23a2(mdo 'grel): 'dris pa med par gnas par bya/ /bdag ni rnyed mang bkur stir bcas/ /bdag la mang po dga' o zhes/ /de 'da' i bsnyems pa 'chad gyur na/ /shi ba'i 'og tu 'jigs pa skye/ /dpas rnam par rmongs pa'i yid/ /gang dang gang la chags gyur pa/ /de dang de songs stong 'gyur
23a3(mdo 'grel): du/ /sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur zhing dang/ /de bas mkhas pas chags mi bya/ /chags pha las ni 'jigs pa skye/ /'di dag rang bzhin 'dor 'gyur bas/ /brtan par gyis te rab tu rtogs/ /rnyed pa dag ni ma byung zhing/ /grags dang snyan pa byung gyur kyang/ /rnyed dang
23a4(mdo 'grel): grags pa'i tshogs bcas te/ /gang du 'dor pa'i gtol med do/ /bdag la smod pa gzhan yod na/ /bstong pas bdag dgar ci zhig yod/ /bdag la bstong pa gzhan yod na/ /smad pas mi dgar ci zhig yod/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bas
23a5(mdo 'grel): kyang ni mi mgu na/ /bdag 'drang na pas smos ci dgos/ /de bas 'jig rten bsams pa btang/ /sems can rnyed pa med la smod/ /rnyed pa can la mi snyan brjod/ /rang bzhin 'grogs dka' de dag gis/ /dga' ba ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir byis
23a6(mdo 'grel): ba rang don ni/ /med par dga' ba mi 'byung byas/ /byis dang bshes pa dga' med ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /nags na ri dags bya dag dang/ /shing rnams mi snyan brjod mi byed/ /'grogs na bde ba de dag dang/ /nam zhig lhan cig
