23a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gnas 'gyur/ /phug gam lha khang stong pa'am/ /ljon shing drung du gnas bcas te/ /nam zhig rgyab? tu mi lta zhing/ /chags pa med par 'gyur zhig gu/ /sa phyogs bdag gir bzung med pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni yongs rnams su/ /rang dbang spyod cing
23b1(mdo 'grel): chag? med par/ /nam zhig bdag ni gnas par 'gyur/ /lhung bzed la sogs nyi tshe dang/ /kun la mi mkho'i gos 'chang zhing/ /lus ni sba bar ma byas kyang/ /'jigs med gnas par nam zhig 'gyur/ /dur khrod song nas gzhan dag gi /rus gong dag dang bdag
23b2(mdo 'grel): lus/ /'jig pa'i chogs can dag tu ni/ /nam zhig mgo snyoms byed par 'gyur/ /bdag gi lus ni 'di nyid kyang/ /gang gi dri yis wa dag kyang/ /drung du nyer 'gror mi 'gyur ba/ /de lta bur ni 'gyur par 'ong/ /lus 'di gcig pu byung ba yang/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i
23b3(mdo 'grel): sha rus dag /zhig ste so sor 'gyes 'gyur na/ /mdza' ba gzhan lta ci na gi smos/ /skye na'ang gcig pu skye 'gyur zhing/ /'chi na'ang de nyid gcig 'chi ste/ /sdug bsngal skal gzhan mi len no/ /gegs byed mdza' bas ci zhig bya/ /lam dag tu ni zhugs pa rnams/ /ji ltar
23b4(mdo 'grel): gnas? ni 'dzin byed ltar/ /de bzhin srid pa'i lam zhugs pa'am/ /skye ba'i gnas ni yongs su 'dzin/ /'jig rten kun nas gdung bzhin du/ /ji srid skyes bu bzhi yis ni/ /de las de ni ma brtog pa/ /de srid du ni nags su song/ /bshes med 'khon pa'ang med
23b5(mdo 'grel): byas nis/ /lus 'di gcig pu dpen gnas te/ /snga nas shi dang 'drang brtsis nas/ /shi na'ang mya ngan byed pa med/ /drung na 'khod pa su dag kyang/ /mya ngan gnod pa byed med pas/ /de yis sangs rgyas rjes dran sogs/ /sus kyang g.yengs par 'gyur ba med/ /
23b6(mdo 'grel): de bas shin tu mdangs dga' ba'i/ /nag tshal tshogs chung ba de skyed cing/ /g.yeng ba thams cad zhi byed par/ /bdag nyid gcig pu gnas par byed/ /bsam pa gzhan gyis kun btang ste/ /bdag la sems pa gcig pu yis/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag
23b7(mdo 'grel): phyir dang/ /dul bar bya phyir brtson nga? bya/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol duAng/ /'dod? pa rnams ni phung khrul bskyed/ /'dir ni bsad dang bcing dang gcod/ /pha rol du ni dmyal sogs bsgrub/ /pho nya pho nya mo yis sngon/ /gang byir du mar gsol btab
24a1(mdo 'grel): cing/ /sdig pa rnams sam grags min la'ang/ /gang gi don du ma gzems par/ /'jigs ba la yang bdag gzhugs shing/ /rdzas kyang zad par byas gyur te/ /gsal yongs su bzhung pa na/ /mchog tu dga' 'gyur de dag nyid/ /? dus? nyid yin gzhan
24a2(mdo 'grel): min na/ /rang dbang dang ni bdag min la/ /rab tu 'dod cing yongs zhe nas/ /ci phyir mya ngan 'das mi 'gro/ /gang zhig dang po 'bang? de bteg/ /drangs kyang ngo chos 'og tu lta/ /sngon ni mthong ram ma mthong yang/ /zhes kyis gdod ni g.yogs par gyur/ /khyod nyon mongs ba'i gdang
24a3(mdo 'grel): de ni/ /de lta mngon sum gyur ba bzhin/ /bya rgod? kyis gsal byas mthong na/ /da lta ci phyir 'byed bar byed/ /gzhan rnams mig gis lhan yang/ /'ga' zhig yongs su bsrungs gyur pa/ ji srid da ni de za na/ /ser sna can khyod ces mi bsung/ /sha yi phung po 'di mthong nas
24a4(mdo 'grel): bya rgod dang gzhan za byed na/ /gzhan gyi zas la me tog gi /phreng btsan dan rgyan gyis mchod/ /rus gong cing du mthong nas ni/ /mi 'gul yang ni khyod skrag na/ /ro langs bzhin du 'ga' yis kyang/ /bskyod par gyur na ces mi 'jigs/ /gang la g.yogs kyang 'di chags
24a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de? ma g.yogs na ci mi 'dod/ /de la dgos pa med na ni/ /g.yogs pa la ni ci phyir 'khyung/ /zas ni gcig pu nyid las ni/ /bshad dag pa chu byung? gyur na/ /de la bshad la mi dga' zhing/ /kha chu la khyod ci phyir dga' / /shing bal rag na 'jam pa yi/ /sngas
24a6(mdo 'grel): la dga' bar mi byed par/ /dring 'dzag pa ma yin zhes/ /'dod ldan mi gtsang ba la rmongs/ /'dod ldan dan pa rmongs pa rnams/ /shing bal reg na 'jam pa la/ /nyal po bya bar mi nus zhes/ /dal khro ba dag tu byang/ /gal te mi gtsang chags med na/ /dus bzab rgyus
24a7(mdo 'grel): bas sbrel pa la/ /sha yi 'dam gyis zhal zhal byas/ /gzhan khyod ce phyir bang du 'khyung/ /khyod nyid mi gtsang mar yod pa/ /de nyid la khyod brtan spyod cing/ /mi gtsang rkyal? pa gzhan dag la'ang/ mi gtsang btam? pas 'dod bar byed/ /bdag ni sha 'di la dga' ?
24b1(mdo 'grel): reg dang lta bar 'dod na go /sems med pa yi rang bzhin gyi/ /sha ni khyod go cis? mi 'dod/ /'dod pa'i sems gang yin pa de/ /reg dang blta bar mi nus la/ /gang zhig nus de shes pa min?/ /don med 'khyad de ci zhig bya/ /mi gtsang rang bzhin gzhan gyi lus/ /mi rtogs
24b2(mdo 'grel): ngo mtshar mi che yi/ /rang nyid mi gtsang 'di yin par/ /rtogs par mi 'gyur ngo mtshar che/ /sprin bral nyi zer gyis phyi ba'i/ pad+ma gzhon nu spangs nas ni/ /mi gtsang zhen pa'i sems kyis ro/ /mi gtsang gzig la ci phyid dga' o/ /sa phyogs mi gtsang gis gos pa/ /gal te rog
24b3(mdo 'grel): par mi 'dod na/ /gang las de ni byung ba yi/ /lus la ji ltar khyod reg 'dod/ /gal te mi gtsang chags med na/ /mi gtsang zhing las? byung gyur cing/ /de yis sa bon nges bskyed pa/ /gzhan yang ci phyir bang du 'khyud/ /mi gtsang las byung mi gtsang srin?/ /chung nguAng khyod 'dod
24b4(mdo 'grel): mi byed la/ /mi gtsang mang gi rang bzhin lus/ /mi gtsang skyes pa'ang 'dod bar byed/ /khyod ni rang gi mi gtsang la/ /smong mi byed par ma zad kyi/ /mi gtsang rgyal pa mi gtsang la/ /brkam pas gzhan yang 'dod par byed/ /ga bur la sogs yid 'ongs? dang/ /'das chan dgag ma
24b5(mdo 'grel): tshor ma'ang rung/ /khar bcug phyir phyud bor ba yi/ /sa yang mi gtsang brtsog bar 'gyur/ /gal te mi gtsang 'di 'dra ba/ /mngon sum gyur kyang the tshom na/ /dur khrod dag tu bor ba'i lus/ /mi gtsang gzhan yang blta bar gyis/ /gang las pags pa'i kha phye na/ /'jigs pa chen po
24b6(mdo 'grel): skye 'gyur bar/ /shes kyang ji ltar de nyid la/ /phyir zhing dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /lus la bskus pa'i dri nge yang/ /tsan dan sogs yin gzhan ma yin/ /gzhan gyi dri yis gzhan dag la/ /ci yi phyir na chags par byed/ /gal te rang bzhin dri nga?  ba/ /'di la mchags
24b7(mdo 'grel): legs min nam/ /'jig rten don med srad pa dag /ci ste de la 'dri zhim skud/ /'on te dri zhim tsan dan ni/ /lus la 'di ni ci zhig 'byug /gzhan gyi dri yis gzhan dag? la/ /ci yi phyir na chags par byed/ /gal te skris? na ring ba dang/ /so skya dri mar bcas pa dang/ /'dam gyis dris
25a1(mdo 'grel): bsgos gcer bu ste/ /lus kyi rang bzhin 'jigs bcas na/ /rang la gnod pa'i mtshen bzhin na/ /de 'bang ci phyir byi dor byed/ /bdag la rmongs pa'i 'bang pa yis/ /smos pas sa 'di 'khrugs pa yis/ /rus gong 'ga' zhig mthong nas ni/ /dud
25a2(mdo 'grel): khrong du ni yang byung na/ /g.yo ba'i rus gong gis khyab pa'i/ /grong gi dur khrod la dga' 'am/ /de ltar mi gtsang gyur pa de/ /rin med par ni mi rnying do/ /de don sgrub pas sha thang dang/ /dmyal la sogs pas gnod pa 'gyur/ /byis ba nang spel mi nus pas/ /dar la bab na cis 'dir
25a3(mdo 'grel): bde/ /rbod? sogs pa yi tshig/ gtugs nas/ /rgas nas 'dod pas ci zhig bya/ /'dod ldan ngan pa kha cig ni/ /nyin rangs las kyis yongs du? pa ste/ /khyim du 'ongs nas chad pa'i lus/ /ro dang 'dra bar nyal bar byed/ /kha cig byes bgrod nyon mongs dang/ /ring du song ba'i sdug
25a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal can/ /bu smang 'dod bzhin bu smad rnams/ /khyung khong los kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /bdag la ban 'dogs rnams rmongs pas/ /gang don nyid du brtsongs pa yang/ /de ma thob par don med pa'i/ /gzhan gyi las kyi rlung gis bdas/ /la la rang gi lus brtsongs shing/ /
25a5(mdo 'grel): dbang med gzhan gyis bkol gyur te/ /chung ma dag kyang bu byung na/ /shing drung dgon par bab bab 'byung/ 'dod pas bslus pa'i glen pa dag/ 'tsho 'dod 'tsho bar bya'o zhes/ /sreg stong rigs bzhin g.yul du 'jug /khyo phyir bran du 'gro bar byed/ /'dod ldan la la lus kyang
25a6(mdo 'grel): bcang/ /kha cig gsal shing rtsal btsugs/ /kha cig mdung thung dag gis bsnun/ /kha cig bsreg pa dag kyang snang/ /bsags dang bsrung dang rlag pa'i gdung ba yis/ /nor ni phug brol mdza' yas shes par bya/ /nor la chags pas g.yengs gyur pa rnams//
25a7(mdo 'grel): sping pa'i sdug bsngal las grol skabs med do/ /'dod ldan rnams la de la sogs/ /nyes dmigs mad? la mnog chung ste/ /shing rta 'dren pa'i phyugs dag gi/ rtswa ni kham 'ga' thos pa bzhin/ /phyugs kyis bsgrubs na'ang mi dkon pa'i/ /mnog? chung gang
25b1(mdo 'grel): yin de don du/ /ngal 'byor phun sum rnyed dka' 'di/ /las kyis mnar ba rnams kyis bcom/ /'dod pa nges par 'jig 'gyur zhing/ /dmyal la sogs par ltung khyad pa/ /chen po min phyir dus kun du/ /dub ba'i tshegs byung gang yin pa/ /de yi bye ba'i cha tsam gyi/ /tshegs kyis
25b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid 'grub na/ 'dod ldan byang chub sbyong pa bas/ /sdug bsngal cha la byang chub med/ /dmyal sogs sdug bsngal bsam byas na/ /'dod pa rnams la mtshon dang ni/ /dug dang mi dang g.yang sa dang/ /dgra rnams kyis khyad dpir? mi phong/ /de ltar 'dod pa skyo phyis te/ /dben pa
25b3(mdo 'grel): la ni dga' pa bskyed/ rtsod dang nyon mongs kyis stong pa/ /zhi ba'i nags kyi nang dag tu/ /skal ldan zla 'od tsan dan gyis bsil ba'i/ /yangs pa'i rnga ? khang bzangs nyams dga' bar/ /sgra mdza? zhi ba'i nags rlung g.yob pa yis/ /gzhan la phan don sems shing
25b4(mdo 'grel): chags par byed/ /kha bstong shing drung phug dag tu/ /gang du ji srid 'dod gnas shing/ /yongs 'dzin bsrung pa'i sdug bsngal spangs/ /bltos pa med pa'i bag yangs spyod/ /rang dbang spyod cing chags med la/ /gang dang yang ni 'brel med pa'i/ /chog shes bde spyod gang yin
25b5(mdo 'grel): pa?/ /dbang pos kyang ni de rnyed dka' / /de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis/ /dben pa'i yon tan bsams byas nas/ /rnam rtog nye bar zhi ba ngang/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa ni/ /dang po nyid du 'bang de bsgom/ /bde dang sdug bsngal
25b6(mdo 'grel): mnyam pas ni/ /thams cad bdag bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /lag pa la sogs dbye ba rnam mang yang/ /yongs su bsrung bya'i lus su gcig pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro pa'i bde sdug tha dad dag /thams cad bdag bzhin bde ba 'dod mnyam gcig /gal te bdag
25b7(mdo 'grel): gis sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzhan gyi lus la mi gnod pa/ /de lta'ang de dag sdug bsngal de/ /bdag tu zhen pas mi bzong nyid/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis sdug bsngal dag/ bdag la 'bab par mi 'gyur yang/ /de lta'ang de dag sdug bsngal te/ /bdag tu zhe na pas bzong par
26a1(mdo 'grel): dka' / /bdag gis gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bsal/ /sdug bsngal yin phyir bdag sdug bzhin/ /bdag gis gzhan la phan par bya/ /sems can yin phyir bdag lus bzhin/ /gang tshe bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga /bde ba 'dod du mtshungs pa la/ /bdag
26a2(mdo 'grel): dang khyad par ci yod na/ /gang phyir bdag gcig bde bar brtson/ /gang tshe bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga /sdug bsngal mi 'dod mtshungs pa la/ /bdag dang khyad par ci yod na/ /gang phyir gzhan min bdag srung byed/ /gal te de la sdug bsngal pas/ /bdag la mi gnod phyir mu srung//
26a3(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa yi sdug bsngal yang/ /gnod mi byed na de cis srung/ /bdag gi de ni myong snyam pa'i/ /rnam par rtog de log pa ste/ /'di ltar shi ba'ang gzhan nyid la/ /skye ba'ang ni gzhan nyid yin/ /gang tsha gang gi sdug bsngal gang/ /de ni de nyid kyis bsrung na/ /rkang ba'i sdug
26a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal lag pas min/ /ci phyir nges ni de bsrung bya/ /gal te rigs pa min yang 'dir/ /bdag tu 'dzin pas 'jug ce na/ /bdag gzhan mi rigs gang yin te/ /ca nus par ni spangs bya nyid/ /rgyud dang tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ /phreng ba dmag la sogs bzhin brdzun/ /sdug
26a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal can gang de med pa/ /nges 'dis su zhig dbang bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal bdag po med par ni/ /thams cad bye brag med pa nyid/ /sdug bsngal yin phyir de bsal bya/ /nges pa des ni ci zhig bya/ /ci phyir kun gyi sdug bsngal ni/ /bzlog par bya zhes brtad du med/ /
26a6(mdo 'grel): gal te bzlog na thams cad bzlog /de min bdag kyang sems can bzhin/ /snying rje sdug bsngal mang 'gyur bas/ /ci phyir nan gyis skyed cen/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsams byas na/ /ji ltar snying rje sdug bsngal mang/ /gal te sdug bsngal gcig gis ni/ /sdug bsngal mang
26a7(mdo 'grel): du med 'gyur na/ /brtse dang ldan bas sdug bsngal de/ /rang dang gzhan la bskyed bya nyid/ /des na me tog zla mtshes kyis/ /rgyal pa'i gnod pa shes kyang ni/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal ma bsal te/ /mang po'i sdug bsngal zad 'gyur phyir/ /de ltar rgyud ni goms gyur pa//
26b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhing dga' bas/ /pad+ma'i mtsho du dang pa ltar/ /mnar med par yang 'jug par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams ni grol ba na/ /dga' ba'i rgya mtsho gang yin pa/ /de nyid kyi ni mchog min nam/ /thar pa 'dod pas ci zhig bya/ /de ltar gzhan gyi don byas kyang//
26b2(mdo 'grel): rlom sems da ni ngo mtshar med/ /gcig tu gzhan don la dga' bas/ /rnam smin 'bras bu re ba med/ /de bas ji ltar chung du na/ /mi snyan las kyang bdag bsrung ba/ /de bzhin gzhan la bsrung sems dang/ /snying rje'i sems na de ltar bya/ /goms pa yis ni gzhan dag gis
26b3(mdo 'grel): /bu ba khrag gi cig pa la/ /dngos po med par gyur kyang ni/ /bdag go zhes ni shes pa ltar/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi lus la yang/ /bdag ces ci yi phyir mi gzung/ /bdag gi lus ni gzhan dag tuAng/ /gzhag pa de ltar dka' ba med/ /bdag nyid skyon bcas gzhan la yang//
26b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan rgya mtshor shes byas nas/ /bdag 'dzin yongs su dor ba dang/ /gzhan blang ba ni bsgom par bya/ /ji ltar lag pa la sogs pa/ /lus kyi yan lag yin 'dod ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i yan lag tu/ /ci phyir lus can rnams mi 'dod/ /ji ltar bdag med lus
26b5(mdo 'grel): 'di la/ /gom pas bdg gi blo 'byung ba/ /de bzhin sems can gzhan la'ang/ /goms pas bdag blo ces bskyed/ /dr lta na ni gzhan gyi don/ /byas kyang ngo mtshar rlom mi 'byung/ /bdag nyid kyi ni zas zos nas/ /lan la re ba mi 'bung bzhin/ /de bas ji ltar chung du na//
26b6(mdo 'grel): mi snyan ras kyang bdag bsrung ba/ /de bzhin 'gro la bsrung sems dang/ /snying rje'i sems ni goms par bya/ /de bas mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba yis/ /'khor g yi 'jigs pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /rang gi mtshan yang byin gyis brlabs/ /dka' 
26b7(mdo 'grel): las phyir bzlog mi bya ste/ /'di ltar goms pa'i mthu yis ni/ /gang gi ming thos 'jigs pa yang/ /de nyid med na mi dgar 'gyur/ /gang zhig bdag dang gzhan rnams ni/ /myur du bsgrub par 'dod pa des/ /bdag dang gzhan du brje bar bya/ /gsang ba'i dam pa spod
27a1(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /bdag lus gang la chags pa yi/ /'jigs gnas chung la'ang 'jigs skye ba/ /'jigs pa skye ba'i lus de la/ /su zhig dgra bzhin sdang mi byed/ /lus gang bkres dang skom sogs nang/ /gos ba'i cho ga byed 'dod pas/ /bya dang
27a2(mdo 'grel): nya dang ri dags dag/ gsod par byed cing lam sgugs byed/ /gang zhig khe dang rim gro'i phyir/ /pha dang ma yang gsong byed cing/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor brkus nas/ /des na mnar med bsreg 'gyur na/ /mkhas pa su zhig lus de la/ /'dod cing bsrung dang mchod
27a3(mdo 'grel): byed kyi/ /'di la su zhig dgra bzhin du/ /lta ba mi byed brnyas mi byed/ /gal te byin na ci sbyad ces/ /bdag don sems pa 'dre yi tshul/ /gal te spyad ne ci sbyin zhes/ /gzhan don sems pa lha yi chos/ /bdag phyir gzhan la gnod byas na/ /dmyal la
27a4(mdo 'grel): sogs par gdung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan phyir bdag la gnod byas na/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob/ /bdag nyid mtho bar 'dod pa des/ /ngan 'gro ngan dang glen par 'gyur/ /de nyid gzhan la spo byas na/ /bde 'gror rim gro thob par 'gyur/ /bdag gi
27a5(mdo 'grel): don du gzhan bkol na/ /bran la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi don du bdag spyad na/ /rje dpon nyid sogs myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten bde pa ji snyed pa/ /de kun gzhan bde 'dod las byung/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed pa/ /de kun ngang bde 'dod
27a6(mdo 'grel): las byung/ /mang du bshad lta ci zhig dgos/ /byis pa rang gi don byed dang/ /thub pa gzhan gyi don mdzad pa/ /'di gnyis kyi ni khyad par ltos/ /bdag bde gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag/ yang dag brje ber ma byas na/ /sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'grub cing/ /'khor
27a7(mdo 'grel): pa na yang bde pa med/ /'jig rten pha rol phar zhog gi/ bran g.yogs las mi byed pa dang/ /rje dpon ngan pa mi ster pa'i/ /tshe 'di'i don yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /mthong dang ma mthong bde 'grub pa'i/ /phun sum bde skyid longs bor zhing/ /gzhan la sdug bsngal
27b1(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i rgyud/ /rmongs pa sdug bsngal mi zad len/ /'jig rten dag na 'tsho ba gang yod dang/ /'jigs dang sdug bsngal ji snyed yod gyur pa/ /de kun bdag du 'dzin pa las byung na/ /'dre chen des ko bdag la ci zhig bya/ /bdag nyid yongs sum btang na/ /sdug bsngal spang bar
27b2(mdo 'grel): mi nus te/ /ji ltar me ni ma btang na/ /sreg pa spong par mi nus bzhin/ /de lta par dag nyid zhi ba dang/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid gzhan la btang bar bya/ /gzhan rnams bdag bzhin bzung bar bya/ /bdag ni gzhan gyi dbang gyur ces/ /yid
27b3(mdo 'grel): khyod nges par shes gyis la/ /sems can kun don ma gtogs pa /de ni khyod kyis gzhan mi bsam/ /gzhan dbang mig la sogs pa yis/ /rang don bsgrub pa'i rigs ma yin/ /de de na mig la sogs pa yin/ /de la log par bya mi rigs/ des na sems can gtsor byas
27b4(mdo 'grel): te/ /bdag nyid lus la ci mthong ba/ /de dang de ni phrogs nas kyang/ /gzhan dag la ni phan par spyod/ /dman sogs bdag du byas pa dang/ /gzhan nyid du ni bdag byas nas/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis su/ /phrag dog 'gran dang nga rgyal bsgom/ /'di ni bkur byas bdag
27b5(mdo 'grel): ni min/ /'di bzhin bdag gis ma rnyed cing/ /'di ni bstod byas bdag la smad/ /'di bde bdag ni sdug bsngal la/ /bdag ni las rnams byed pa dang/ /'di ni bde ba nyid du gnas/ /'di ni 'jig rten la che dang/ /bdag dman yon tan med par grags/ /yon tan med pas
27b6(mdo 'grel): ci zhig bya/ /bdag kun yon tan ldan pa nyid/ /gang pas 'dir man de yod cing/ /gang bas bdag mchog de yang yod/ tshul khrims blta ba rgud sogs ni/ /nyon mongs stobs kyis bdag dbang min/ /ci nus bdag ni gso dgos te/ /gnod pa'ang bdag gis dang du blang//
27b7(mdo 'grel): 'on te bdag 'di gso bya min/ /ci phyir bdag la brnyas pa byed/ /bdag la de yis yon tan gyis/ /ci bya 'di bdag yon tan can/ /dan 'gro gdug pa'i bar gnas pa/ /'gro la snying rje med par 'di/ /phyir la yon tan rlom pa yis/ /mkhas pa bdag la sngo par 'dod/ /
28a1(mdo 'grel): bdag dang mnyam la bltas nas ni/ /gang gis rang gi ltag bya phyir/ /bdag ni rnyed dang bkur sti ni/ /rtsod pa yis kyang nges par bsgrub/ /ci nas bdag gi yon tan ni/ /'jig rten kun la gsal ba dang/ /gzhan yang 'di yi yon tan
28a2(mdo 'grel): gang/ /sus kyang thos par mi 'gyur bya/ /bdag gi skyon yang pas? bya zhing/ /bdag ni mchod 'gyur 'di la min/ /bdag deng rnyed pa legs rnyed cing/ /bdag ni bkur 'gyur 'di la min/ /'di ni ma rungs byas pa la/ /yun ring bdag ni dga' bas blta/ /'gro ba
28a3(mdo 'grel): kun gyi bzhad gang dang/ /phan tshun gnod pa dag tu bya/ /nyon mongs 'di yang bdag dang ni/ /lhan cig tu ni 'gran zhes grags/ /'di bdag thos dang shes rab ba ma/ /gzugs rigs nor gyis mnyam mam ci/ /de ltar kun la grags pa yis/ /bdag gi
28a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan thos nas ni/ /spu ldang dga' ba skye 'gyur pa'i/ /bde skyid la ni yongs su spyod/ /ci ste 'di la rnyed yod kyang/ /gal te da yi las byed na/ /'di la 'tsho btsam? byin nas/ /bdag gi stobs kyis de blang bya/ /'di ni bde bas nyams bya zhing/ /bdag gis
28a5(mdo 'grel): snod ? rtag sbyar bya/ /'di yis brgya phrag thams cad du/ /'khor bar bdag la gnod pa byas/ /yid khyod rang don byed 'dod pas/ /bskal pa grangs med 'da' gyur kyang/ /ngal ba chen po de lta bus/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bsgrubs /de ltar nges par
28a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag gi/ don la rab tu 'jug gyis dang/ /thub pa'i bka' ni mi slu bas/ /de yi yon tan phyis mthong 'gyur/ /gal te khyod kyis snga dus su/ /las 'di byas par gyur na ni/ /sangs rgyas phun tshogs bde min pa/ /'di 'dra'i gnas skabs srid mi 'gyur//
28a7(mdo 'grel): de bas ji ltar gzhan dag ni/ /khu ba khrag gi thigs pa la/ /khyod kyis ngar 'dzin byas pa ltar/ /de bzhin gzhan la'ang goms par gyis/ /gzhan gyis rtog chen byas nas ni/ /bdag gi lus la ci snang ba/ /de dang de nyid phrogs byas nas/ /khyod kyis gzhan la
28b1(mdo 'grel): phan par spyod/ /bdag skyid gzhan ni mi skyid pa/ /bdag mtho gzhan ni dma' ba dang/ /bdag ni phan byed gzhan min zhes/ /bdag la phrag dog cis mi byed/ /bdag ni bde dang bral gyis te/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag la sbyor/ /gang tshe 'di ni ci byed ces/ /bdag gi skyon la
28b2(mdo 'grel): brtag par gyis/ /gzhan gyis nyes pa byas pa yang/ /rang gi skyon du bsgrub byos la/ /bdag gis nyes pa chung byas kyang/ /skye po mngal rab tu shogs/ /gzhan gyi grags pa lhag brjod pas/ /rang gis grags pa zil gyis no na/ /bdag ni bran gyi tha ma ltar/ /don
28b3(mdo 'grel): rnams kun la bkol bar gyis/ /'di ni skyon bcas rang bzhin gyis/ /blo bur yon tan chas mi bstod/ /'di yi yon tan ci nas kyang/ /'gas kyang mi shes de ltar gyis/ /mnor na bdag gi don gyi phyir/ /khyod kyis gzhan la gnod byas gang/ /gnod de sems can
28b4(mdo 'grel): don gyi phyir/ /bdag nyid la ni 'bab par gyis/ /'di ni gnya' drag 'gyur tshul du/ /shed ba skyed par ni mi bya ste/ /bag ma gsar pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /ngo tsha 'jigs dang bsdams te bzhag/ de bya de ltar gnas bya zhing/ /de ltar khyod kyis mi bya ba/ /de ltar 'di
28b5(mdo 'grel): ni dbang byas te/ /de las 'das na tshar bcang bya/ /'on te de ltar gdams kyang ni/ /yid khyod de ltar mi byed na/ /khyod la nyes kun brten pas ni/ /khyod nyid tshar bcad bya par zad/ /khyod kyis kho bo gar brlag pa'i/ /sngon gyi dus de gzhan yin te/ /ngas mthong khyod
28b6(mdo 'grel): da gang du 'gro/ khyod kyi dregs pa kun gzhom bya/ /da dung bdag la rang gi don/ /yong snyam sems pa de dor cig /bdag gis gzhan la khyod ? kyis/ /skyo par ma sems zho sha phul/ /gal te bdag med gyur nas khyod/ /sems can rnams la ma byin na/ /
28b7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis kho bo dmyal pa yi/ /srung ma rnams la phyin du nges/ /de ltar khyod kyis re lta zhig/ /bo bo byin pas yun ring sdug/ da ni 'khon rnams dran byas te/ /khyod kyis rang don sems pa gzhom/ /de ste bdag ni dga' 'dod na/ /rang la bdag gis 
29a1(mdo 'grel): dgar mi bya/ /de ste bdag gi bsrung 'dod na/ /gzhan rnams rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /ji lta ji ltar lus 'di la/ /yongs su skyo bar byed 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar shin tu ni/ /gze re can gyur nyid du lhung/ /de ltar lhung ba de yis yang/ /'dod pas 'di
29a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /rdzogs par nus pa yod min na/ /de yi 'dod pa sus byed nus/ /nus med 'dod la nyon mongs dang/ /bsam pa nyams pa'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun la ltos med pa/ /de yi phun tshogs zad mi shes/ /de bas lus kyi 'dod pa ni/ /'phel
29a3(mdo 'grel): phyir skabs dbye mi bya ste/ /gang zhig yid 'ong mi 'dzin pa/ /de ni dngos po bzang po yin/ /tha mar thal ba'i mthar gtugs shing/ /mi g.yo gzhan gyis bskyod byas pa/ /mi gcing gzugs ni mi bzang pa/ /'di la ci phyir bdag tu 'dzin/ /gson nam yang na shi
29a4(mdo 'grel): yang bla'i/ /bdag la 'khrul 'khor 'dis ci bya/ /bong sogs 'di khyad ci yod na/ /kyi hud nga rgyal sel mi byed/ /lus kyi kha ta byas pa yis/ /don med sdug bsngal nyes bsags nas/ /rjes su chags dang khong khro ba/ /shing mtshungs 'di la ci zhig bya//
29a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gis 'di ltar bskyangs pa 'am/ /bya rged sogs kyis zos kyang rung/ /chags med zhe sdang yod min na/ /ci ste de la chags par byed/ /gang zhig smod pas khro ba dang/ /gang zhig bstod pas mgu 'gyur ba/ /gal te de nyid shes med na/ /bdag gis
29a6(mdo 'grel): gang gis ngal pa byas/ /gang zhig lus 'di 'dod gyur pa/ /de dang bdag bshes yin zhe na/ /thams cad rang gi lus 'dod pas/ /de la'ang bdag go cis mi dga' / /de bas bdag gis chags med par/ /'grol phan phyir lus gtang bya/ /des na 'di la
29a7(mdo 'grel): nyes mang yang/ /las kyis spyad bzhin bzung par bya/ /de bas byis pa'i spyod pas chog /bdag gis mkhas pa'i rjes bsnyags te/ /bag yod gtam ni dran byas nas/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa bzlog par bya/ /rgyal sras thugs rje che rnams lta/ /rigs
29b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sran ni gzugs bya ste/ /nyin mtshan phyed par ma 'bad na/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal nam thar phyin/ /de bas sgrib pa bsal pa'i phyir/ /log pa'i lam las sems glan te/ /yang dag dmigs la rtag par yang/ /bdag gi mnyam par bzhag par bya/ /byang chub
29b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ /bsam gtan bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //yan lag 'di dag thams cad ni/ /thub pas shes rab don du gsungs/ /de yis phyir na sdug bsngal dag/ zhi par 'dod pas shes rab
29b3(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam ste/ /'di ni bden pa gnyis su 'dod/ /don dam blo yi spyod yul min/ /blo ni kun rdzob yin par brjod/ /de la 'jig rten rnam gnyis mthong/ /rnal 'byor pa dang phal pa'o/ /de la 'jig rten phal pa ni/ /rnal 'byor 'jig rten
29b4(mdo 'grel): gyis gnon cing/ /rnal 'byor pa yang blo khyad kyis/ /gong ma gong ma rnams kyis gnod/ /gnyi ga y ang ni 'dod pa'i dpes/ /'bras bu'i don dum dpyad phyir/ /'jig rten pa yis dngos mthong zhing/ /yang dag nyid duAng rtog byed kyi/ /sgyu ma lta bur min pas 'dir/
29b5(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor pa dang 'jig rten rtsod/ /gzugs sogs mngon sum nyid kyang ni/ /grags pas yin gyi tshad mas min/ /de ni mi gtsang la sogs la/ /gtsang sogs grags pa bzhin du brdzun/ /'jig rten bzhugs pa'i don du ni/ /mgon pos dngos bstan de
29b6(mdo 'grel): nyid du/ /de dag skad cig ma nyid min/ /kun rdzob tu yang 'gal zhe na/ /rnal 'byor kun rdzob nyes med de/ /'jig rten la ltos de nyid mthong/ /gzhan du bud med mi gtsang bar/ /nges rtog 'jig rten gyis gnod 'gyur/ /sgyu 'dra'i rgyal las bsod nams ni
29b7(mdo 'grel): ji ltar dngos yod la ji bzhin/ /gal te sems can sgyu 'dran/ /shi nas ji ltar skye zhe na/ /ji srid rkyen rnams tshogs gyur pa/ /de srid sgyu ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyun ring tsam gyis ji ltar na/ /sems can bden par yod pa yin/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsang
30a1(mdo 'grel): sogs la/ /sems med phyir na sdig pa med/ /sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan pa la/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig pa 'byung/ /sngags sogs rnams la nus med phyir/ /sgyu ma'i sems ni 'byung ba med /sna tshogs rkyen las byung ba yi/ /
30a2(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma de yang sna tshogs nyid/ /rkyen gcig gis ni kun nus pa/ /gang na yang ni yod ma yin/ /gal te don dam mya ngan 'das/ /'khor ba kun rdzob de lta na/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni 'khor 'gyur bas/ /byang chub spyod pas ci zhig bya/ /rkyen rnams rgyun ni mi chad na/ /sgyu ma
30a3(mdo 'grel): 'ang ldog par mi 'gyur gyi/ /rkyen rnams rgyun ni chad gyur na/ /kun rdzob tu yang mi 'byung ngo/ /gang tshe 'khrul pa'ang yod min na/ /sgyu ma gang gis dmigs par 'gyur/ /gang tshe khyod la sgyu ma nyid/ /med na'ang de tshe ci zhig dmigs/ /gal te de nyid du
30a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan yod/ /rnam pa de ni sems nyid yin/ /gang tshe sems nyid sgyu man/ /de tshe gang zhig gang gis mthong/ /'jig rten gyi ni mgon pos kyang/ /sems kyis sems mi mthong zhes gsungs/ /ngal gri'i so ni rang la rang/ /ji ltar mi gcod de bzhin
30a5(mdo 'grel): yid/ /ji ltar mar me rang gi dngos/ /yang dag gsal bar byed bzhin na/ /mar me gsal bar bya min te/ /gang phyir mun gyis bsgribs pa med/ /shel bzhin sngon po sngo nyid la/ /gzhan la bltos pa yod ma yin/ /de bzhin 'ga' zhig gzhan la ni//
30a6(mdo 'grel): bltos dang bltos med pa yang ma theng/ /sngo nyid min la sngon por de/ /bdag gis bdag nyid byas pa med/ /mar me gsal bar byed do zhes/ /shes pas shes te brjod byed na/ /blo ni gsal par med do/ /gal te rang rig yod min na/ /rnam shes dran par ji
30a7(mdo 'grel): gang? che 'gas kyang mthong min na/ /gsal pa 'am ni mig gsal pa/ /mo gsham bu mo'i 'gying bag bzhin/ /de ni brjod kyang don med do/ /gal te rang rig yod min na/ /rnam shes dran par ji ltar 'gyur/ /gzhan myong ba ma 'brel pa las/ /
30b1(mdo 'grel): dran 'gyur bya ba'i dug bzhin no/ /rkyen gzhan dag dang ldan pa ni/ /mthong phyir rang nyid rab gsal na/ /grub pa'i mig sman spyod pa las /bum mthong mig sman nyid 'gyur min/ /ji ltar mthong thos shes pa dag /'dir ni dgag par bya min te/ /'dir ni sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa
30b2(mdo 'grel): bden par rtog pa bzlog bya yin/ /sems las sgyu ma gzhan min zhing/ /gzhan min par yang mi brtag na/ /dngos na ji ltar de bzhin? min/ /gzhan min zhes na dngos por med/ /ji lta sgyu ma bden min yang/ /blta bya de bzhin lta byed yin/ /gal te 'khor ba
30b3(mdo 'grel): dngos rten can/ /de ni gzhan du mkha' 'drar 'gyur/ /dngos med dngos la brten pas na/ /byed dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sems ni grogs med par/ /gcig pu nyid du 'gyur pa yin/ /gang tshe sems ni gzung pa la bya/ /de tshe thams cad de bzhin
30b4(mdo 'grel): gshegs/ /de lta na yang sems tsam du/ /brtags na yon tan ci zhig yod/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes na yang/ /ji ltar nyon mongs ldog 'gyur te/ /gang che sgyu ma'i bud med la/ /de byed nyid kyang chags skye 'gyur/ /de byed pa ni shes bya la/ /nyon mongs bag?
30b5(mdo 'grel): chags ma spangs pas/ /des na de mthong ba na de/ /stong nyid bag chags nyam chung zhing/ /stong nyid bag chags goms pas ni/ /dngos pa'i bag chags spong 'gyur zhing/ /ni yang med ces goms pas ni/ /de yang phyi nas spong bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe gang zhig med
30b6(mdo 'grel): do zhes/ /brtag bya'i dngos po mi dmigs pa/ /de tshe? dngos med rten bral ba/ /blo yi mdun du ji ltar gnas/ /gang tshe dngos dang dngos med dag/ blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa/ /de tshe rnam pa gzhan med pas/ /dmigs pa med par rab tu zhi/ /yid bzhin nor bu
30b7(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam shing/ /ji ltar re ba yongs skor ba/ /de bzhin gdul bya'i smon lam gyis/ /dbang gis rgyal ba'i skur snang ngo/ /dper na nam mkha' lding gi ni/ /mchod sngor bskabs nas 'das gyur pa/ /de 'das yun ring lon yang de/ /dug la sogs bzhi
31a1(mdo 'grel): byed bzhin/ /byang chub spyod dang rjes mthun pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod sngor bsgrubs pa yang/ /byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las/ /'das kyang don rnams thams cad mdzad/ /sems med pa la mtshor byed pas/ /ji ltar 'bras bu ldan par 'gyur/
31a2(mdo 'grel): gang phyir bzhugs pa'am mya ngan 'das/ /mtshungs pa kho nar bshad phyir ro/ /kun rdzob pa ma ni de nyid duAng/ /rung ste de 'bras lung las yin/ /dper na bden pa'i sangs rgys la/ /ji ltar 'bras bu bcas pa bzhin/ /bden pa mthong bar grol 'gyur gyi/ /stong nyid
31a3(mdo 'grel): mthong bas ci zhig bya/ /gang phyir lung las lam 'di ni/ /med par byang chub med par gsungs/ /gal te theg chen ma grub na/ /khyod kyi lung ni ji ltar grub/ /gang phyir gnyis ka la 'di grub/ /dang por khyod la 'di ma grub/ /rkyen gang gis ni der yid ches/ /de ni theg chen
31a4(mdo 'grel): la yang mtshungs/ /gzhan gnyis 'dod pas bden na mi/ /rig byed sogs kyang bden par 'gyur/ /theg chen rtsod bcang phyir zhe na/ /lung la mu stegs can rnams dang/ /lung gzhan la yang rang gzhan dag /rtsod bcas yin phyir dor byar 'gyur/ /bstan rtsa dge slong nyid
31a5(mdo 'grel): yin na/ /dge slong nyid kyang dka' bar gnas/ /sems ni dmigs dang bcas rnams kyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang dka' bar gnas/ /nyon mongs spangs pas grol na de'i/ /de ma thag tu der 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs med kyang de dag la/ /las kyi nas pa mthong ba yin/ /re zhig
31a6(mdo 'grel): nyer len sred pa ni/ /med ces nges pa nyid ce na/ /srid 'di nyon mongs can min yang/ /kun rmongs gzhin du ci ste med/ /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa yin/ /tshor ba de dag la yang yod/ /dmigs par dang ? bcas pa'i sems/ /'ga' zhig la ni gnas par 'gyur/ /stong
31a7(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ni bral pa'i sems/ /'gags pa slar yang skye 'gyur te/ /'du shes med pa'i snyoms 'jug bzhin/ /des na snod nyid bsgom par bya/ /dag gang mdo sde la 'jug st+te/ /gal te sangs rgyas gsung 'dod na/ /theg chen phal ched khyed cag gi/ na do rang mtshungs
31b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod min nam ci/ /gel te ma rtogs gcig gis ni/ /thams cad skyon dang bcas 'gyur na/ /mdo mtshungs gcig gi thams cad ni/ /rgyal bas gsungs ba cis ma yin/ /dag gang 'od srungs chen po la/ /sogs pas gting dpogs ma gyur pa/ /de ni khyod kyis na rtogs
31b2(mdo 'grel): pas/ /gzungs bya min par su zhig byed/ /rmongs pas sdug bsngal can don du/ /chags dang 'jigs mdza' las grol bar/ /'khor bar gnas pa 'grub 'gyur ba/ /'di ni stong nyid 'bras bu yin/ /de ltar stong pa nyid phyogs la/ /sun 'byin pa ni 'thad ma yin/ /dus na
31b3(mdo 'grel): the tshom mi za bar/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa yi/ /mun pa'i snying po stong pa nyid/ /myur du thams cad mkhyen 'dod pas/ /de ni ji ltar bsgom mi byed/ /dngos gang sdug bsngal skyed byed pa/ /da las skrag pa skye 'gyur na/ /stong nyid
31b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zhi byed pa/ /de las 'jigs pa ji ltar skye/ /gal te bdag 'ga' yod na ni/ /ci yang rung las 'jigs 'gyur na/ /bdag nyid 'ga' yang yod min pas/ /'jigs par 'gyur ba su zhig yin/ /so dang skra sen bdag ma yin/ /bdag ni rus pa khrag ma
31b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /snabs min bad kan ma yin te/ /chu ser dang ni rnag kyang min/ /bdag ni zhag dang rdul min te/ /blo mchin dag kyang bdag ma yin/ /nang khrol gzhan yang bdag min te/ /bdag ni phyis gcin ma yin/ /sha dang pags pa bdag yin te/ /drod dang rlung yang
31b6(mdo 'grel): bdag ma yin/ /bu ga bdag min rnam kun du/ /rnam shes drug kyang bdag ma yin/ /gal te sgra ye shes rtag na/ /thams cad tshe na sgra 'dzin 'gyur/ /shes bya med na ci rig na/ /gang gis shes ba zhes rjod byed/ /gal te shes med sheS yin na/ /shing yang shes
31b7(mdo 'grel): par thal bar 'gyur/ /des na shes bya nyer gnas pa/ /med par shes pa med ces des/ /de nyid kyis ni gzugs shes na/ /de tshe thos pa'ang ci ste min/ /gal te sgra mi nye phyir na/ /nges na de yi shes pa'ang med/ /sgra 'dzin rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de gzugs
32a1(mdo 'grel): *//'dzin par ji ltar 'gyur/ /gcig ni pa dang bu nyid du/ /brtags yin yang dag nyid min te/ /'di ltar snying stobs rdul dang ni/ /mun pa bu min pa yang min/ /de ni sgra 'dzin dang ldan pa'i/ /rang bzhin du ni mthong ma yin/ /gang mkhan lta bur tshul gzhan
32a2(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /de nyid mthong na de rtag min/ /gal te tshul gzhan de nyid na/ /gcig nyid de nyid sngon med cing/ /gal te tshul gzhan bden min na/ /de yi rang gi rang bzhin smos/ /shes nyid ces na de lta na/ /skyes kun gcig tu thal par 'gyur/ /sems pa sems med de dag
32a3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /gcig 'gyur gang phyir yod nyid mtshungs/ /gang tshe bye brag phyin ci log /de tshe 'dra ba'i rten gang yin/ /sems med pa yang bdag min te/ /sems med nyid phyir bum sogs bzhin/ /'on te sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /shes na mi shes 'jig par thal/ /ci ste
32a4(mdo 'grel): bdag la 'gyur med na/ /sems pas de la ci zhig byas/ /de ltar shes med bya bral ba/ /nam mkha' bdag tu byas par 'gyur/ /gal te bdag ni yod min na/ /las 'bras 'brel pa rigs min te/ /las byas nas ni zhig bas na/ /su yi las su 'gyur zhe na/ /bya ba 'bras
32a5(mdo 'grel): gzhi tha dang dang/ /der bdag byed pa med par yang/ /yu bu gnyis ka las grub pas/ /'dir bcas don med ma yin nam/ /rgyu ldan 'bras bu dang bcas zhes/ /mthong ba 'di ni srid ma yin/ /rgyun gcig la ni brtan nas su/ /byed po sbyor po zhes byar bstan/ /'das
32a6(mdo 'grel): dang ma 'ongs pa yi sems/ /bdag min de min med pa'i phyir/ /'on te skye sems bdag yin na/ /de zhig na yang bdag med do/ /dper na chu shing spong po dag /cha shas phye na 'ga' med pa/ /de bzhin rnam par dpyad pa yis/ /btsal na bdag kyang yang dag min/ /
32a7(mdo 'grel): gal te smes can yod min na/ /su la snying rje bya zhe na/ /'bras bu'i don du las blangs pa'i/ /rmongs pas brtags pa gang yin pa'o/ /sems can med 'bras su yi yin/ /bden te 'on kyang rmongs las 'dod/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi don du/ /'bras bu'i rmongs pa bzlog
32b1(mdo 'grel): mi bya/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yi nga rgyal ni/ /bdag du rmongs pas 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de las kyang bzlog med ce na/ /bdag med bsgom pa mchog yin no/ /lus ni rkang pa byin pa min/ /brla dang rked pa'ang lus ma yin/ /lo dang rgyab kyang lus min to/ /brang dang dpung pa'ang lung ma
32b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rtsib logs lag pa'ang lus min te/ /mchan khung phrag pa lus ma yin/ /nang khrol rnams kyang lus min la/ /mgo dang mgrin pa'ang lus min na/ /'di la lus 'di gang zhig yin/ /gal te lus di thams cad la/ /phyogs re yis ni gnas gyur na/ /ma rnams
32b3(mdo 'grel): cha la gnas 'gyur mod/ /de rang nyid ni gang la gnas/ /gal te bdag nyid kun gyi lus/ /leg sogs rnams lag nas na ni/ /lag sogs de dag ji snyed pa/ /da snyed ki ni lus su'gyur/ /phyi dng nang na'ang lus med na/ /ji ltar lag sogs la lus yod/ /lag sogs
32b4(mdo 'grel): rnams las gzhan med na/ /de ni ji ltar yod pa yin/ /des na lus med lag sogs la/ /rmongs pa yis ni lus blor 'gyur/ /dpyings su bkod pa'i khyad par gyis/ /mtho yor la ni mi blo bzhin/ /ji srid rkyen tshogs de srid du/ /mtho yor skyes bu ltar snang ba /de
32b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin ji ? lag sogs la/ /de yod de srid der lus snang/ /de bzhin sor mo'i tshogs yin phyir/ /lag pa'ang gang zhig yin par 'gyur/ /de yang tshigs kyi tshogs yin phyir/ /chags kyang rang gis cha phye bas/ /cha yang rdul du phye bas na/ /rdul de'ang phyogs cha'i
32b6(mdo 'grel): dbye ba yis/ /phyogs dbye pa? cha? shas dang bral phyir/ /mkha' bzhin nges na rdul yang med/ /de ltar rmi lam lta bu yi/ /gzugs la dpyod ldan su zhig chags/ /gang tshe de ltar lus med pa/ /de tshe skyes gang bud med gang/ /sdug bsngal de nyid du yod na/ /ci ste
32b7(mdo 'grel): rab dga' la mi gnad/ /bden mya ngan gdung sogs la/ /zhes sogs ci ste dga' mi byed/ /stobs dang ldan pas zil mnan phyir/ /gal te de myong ma yin na/ /gang zhig nyams myong bdag nyid min/ /de ni tshor ba ji ltar yin/ /sdug bsngal phra mo nyid du yod// 
33a1(mdo 'grel): 'di yi dags pa bsal min nam/ /de ni de las gzhan dag 'tsam/ /zhe na phra nyid de yang de'i/ /gal te 'gal rkyen skyes pas na/ /sdug bsngal skyes pa min na ni/ /tshor bar rtog pa mngon zhe na nyid/ /yin zhes bya bar grub min nam/ /de nyid
33a2(mdo 'grel): phyir na 'di yi ni/ /gnyen bor rnam dpyod 'di bsgom ste/ /rnam brtags zhing las byung ba yi/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor pa yi zas/ /gal te dbang don par bcas na/ /de dag gang du phrad bar 'gyur/ /bar med na yang gcig nyid de/ /gang zhig gang dang phrad
33a3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /rdul phran rdul phran la 'jug med/ /de ni skabs med mnyam pa yin/ /ma zhugs pa la 'dres med cing/ /ma 'dres pa la phrad pa med/ /cha med pa la'ang phrad pa zhes/ /bya ba ji ltar 'thad bar 'gyur/ /phrad pa dang ni cha med pa/ /gal te
33a4(mdo 'grel): mthong na bstan par gyis/ /rnam shes lus med pa la ni/ /phrad pa thad pa ma yin nyid/ /tshegs pa'ang dngos po med phyir te/ /sngar ni ji ltar rnam dbyang bzhin/ /de ltar reg pa yod min na/ /tshor po gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nga la 'di ci yi don du yin/ /
33a5(mdo 'grel): gal las gang la gnod par 'gyur/ /gang tshe tshor po 'ga' med cing/ /tshor ba'ang yod pa ma yin na/ /de che gnas skabs 'di mthong nas/ /srid pa ci phyir ldog mi 'gyur/ /mthong ba 'am ni reg pa yang/ /rmi lam sgyu 'dra'i bdag nyid kyis/ /sems der lhan
33a6(mdo 'grel): cig skyes ba'i phyir/ /tshor pa de yis mthod ma yin/ /sngar dang phyi mar skyes pas kyang/ /dran par 'gyur gyis myong ma yin/ /rang gis bdag nyid myong ma yin/ /gzhan dag gis kyang myong ma yin/ /chor po 'ga' yang yod min te/ /des mtshor?  ba de nyid min/ /
33a7(mdo 'grel): de ltar bdag med tshogs 'di la/ /'di yis ci ste gnod par bya/ /yid ni dbang rnams la mi gnas/ /gzugs sog la yin par na'ang min/ /nang yang sems min phyi min zhing/ /gzhan du yang ni rnyed ma yin/ /gang zhig lus min gzhan duAng min/ /
33b1(mdo 'grel): 'dres min logs su 'ang 'gar med de/ /de ni cung zad min de'i phyir/ /sems can rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /shes bya las sngar shes yod na/ /de ni ci la dmigs nas skye/ /shes dang shes bya lhan cig na/ /de ni ci la dmigs nas skye/ /'on te shes bya'i phyis yod na/ /de tshe
33b2(mdo 'grel): shes pa gang las skye/ /de ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /skye ba rtogs par 'gyur ma yin/ /gal te de ltar kun rdzob med/ /de la bden gnyis gal yod/ /de yang kun rdzob gzhan gyis na/ /sems can mya ngan gal 'da' / /'di ni gzhan sems rnam rtog ste/ /
33b3(mdo 'grel): de ni rang gi kun rdzob min/ /phyis de nges na de yod de/ /med na kun rdzob med pa nyid/ /rtog dang brtag par bya ba dag /gnyis po phan tshun brten pa yin/ /ji ltar grags pa la brten nas/ /rnam par dpyad pa thams cd brjod/ /gang tshe rnam par dpyad pa yi/ /
33b4(mdo 'grel): rnam dpyod kyis ni dpyod byed na/ /de tshe rnam dpyod de yang ni/ /rnam dpyod phyir na thug pa med/ /dpyad bya rnam par dpyad bya na/ /rnam dpyod la ni rten yod min/ /rten med phyir na mi skye ste/ /de yang mya ngan 'das par brjod/ /gang gi ltar na 'di gnyis bden/ /
33b5(mdo 'grel): de nyid shin tu dka' bar gnas/ /gal te shes dbang las don grub/ /shes yod nyid la brten ci yod/ /'on te shes bya las shes grub/ /shes bya yod la'ang rten ci yang/ /de ste phan tshun dbang gis yod/ /gnyis ka yang ni med par 'gyur/ /
33b6(mdo 'grel): gal te bu med pa min na/ /bu ni gang las 'byung ba yin/ /pha med par ni bu med pa/ /de bzhin de gnyis med pa nyid/ /myu gu sa bon las skye zhing/ /sa bon de nyid kyis rtogs bzhin/ /shes bya las skyes shes pa yis/ /de yod pa ni cis mi rtags
33b7(mdo 'grel): myu gu las gzhan shes pa yis/ /sa bon yod ces rtog 'gyur na/ /gang phyir shes bya de rtogs pa'i/ /shes pa yod nyid gang las rtogs /de zhig 'jig rten mngon sum gyis/ /rgyu rnams thams cad mthong ba yin/ /pad+ma'i sdong bu sogs bye ni/ /rgyu bye gang
34a1(mdo 'grel): gi bya shes na/ /sngar gyi rgyu dbye nyid las so/ /ci phyir rgyu yi 'bras bu skyed/ /sngar gyi rgyu yi mthu nyid las/ /dbang phyug 'gro pa'i rgyu yin na/ /re zhig dbang phyug gang yin spros/ /'byung rnams zhe na de lta mod/ /ming tsam la'ang ci? zhig ngal/ /'on
34a2(mdo 'grel): kyang sa sogs du ma dang/ /mi rtag g.yo med lha min zhing/ /bgom bya nyid dang mi gtsang bas/ /de ni dbang phyug nyid ma yin/ /dbang phyug mkha' min g.yo med phyir/ /bdag min sngar ni bkag zin phyir/ /bsam min pa yi byed po yang/ /bsam min brjod pas ci zhig
34a3(mdo 'grel): byed /nges bskyed 'dod pa 'ang gang zhig yin/ /bdag ni de dang sa sogs dang/ /dban phyug ngo bo rtag min nam/ /shes pa shes bya las skyes dang/ /thog med bde sdug las las yin/ /de yis gang zhig skyed pa smros/ /rgyu la thog ma yod min la/ /'bras bu thog
34a4(mdo 'grel): mgo la yod/ /rtag tu ci phyir byed min te/ /de ni gzhan la bltos pa min/ /de byas min gzhan yod min na/ /des 'di gang la bltos par 'gyur/ /gal te bltos na tshogs pa nyid/ /rgyu yin 'gyur gyi dbang phyug min/ /chogs na mi skyed dbang med cing/ /de med
34a5(mdo 'grel): par ni skyed pa min/ /gal te dbang phyug mi 'dod bzhin/ /byed na gzhan gyi dbang du thal/ /'dod na'ang 'dod lar? ga las 'gyur/ /byed na dbang phyug ga la yin/ /gang dang rdul phran rtag smra ba/ /de dag kyang ni sngar bzlog zin/ /gtso bo rtag pa 'gro ba yi/ /rgyu yin
34a6(mdo 'grel): par ni gangs can 'dod/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa zhes/ /bya ba'i yon tan mnyam gnas ni/ /gtso bo zhes byar rab brjod de/ /mi mnyam 'gro ba yin par brjod/ /gcig la rang bzhin gsum nyid ni/ /rigs min nges na de yod min/ /de bzhin yon
34a7(mdo 'grel): tan yod min te/ /de yang so sor rnam gsum phyir/ /yon tan med na sgra sogs kyang/ /yod nyid shin tu rgyad ring 'gyur/ /sems med gos la sogs pa la/ /bde sogs yod pa srid pa'ang min/ /dngos rnams bde rgyu 'am rang bzhin na/ /dngos po rnam
34b1(mdo 'grel): dpyad zin min nam/ /khyod kyi rgyu yang bde sogs nyid/ /de las snam sogs 'byung ba med/ /snam sogs las ni bde sogs yin/ /de med phyir na bde sogs med/ /bde sogs rtag pa nyid du yang/ /nam yang dmigs pa yod ma yin/ /bde sogs
34b2(mdo 'grel): gsal ba yod nyid na/ /myong ba ci phyir 'dzin ma yin/ /de nyid phra mor gyur na de/ /dags dang phra ba 'ang ji ltar yin/ /rags pa dor nas phra gyur pas/ /phra rags de dag mi rtag nyid/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad ni/ /mi rtag nyid du cis mi 'dod/ /rags
34b3(mdo 'grel): pa bden las gzhan min na/ /bde pa gsal bar mi rtag nyid/ /gal te med pa 'ga' yang ni/ /skye min med phyir zhes 'dod na/ /gsa ba med par skye ba ni/ /khyod mi 'dod kyang gnas pa nyid/ /gal te rgyal 'bras gnas na/ /zan za mi gtsang gra? par 'gyur//
34b4(mdo 'grel): ngas? kyi rin gyis ras bal gyi/ /sa bon nyos la bgo bar gyis/ /'jig rten ? pas ma mthong na/ /de nyid shes kyi'ang gzhag de nyid/ /shes de 'jig rten la yang ni/ /yod pas ci ste mthong ma yin/ /'jig rten tshad ma nyid min na/ /gsal mthong
34b5(mdo 'grel): ba'ang bden ma yin/ /gal te tshad mchod min na/ /des gzhal brdzun par mi 'gyur ram/ /de nyid du na stong pa nyid/ /bsgom pa de phyir mi mthar 'gyur/ /brtags pa'i dngos lam reg par/ /de yi dngos med 'dzin ma yin/ /de phyir brdzun pa'i dngos gang yin//
34b6(mdo 'grel): de yi dngos med gsal par brdzun/ /des na rmi lam du shi la/ /de med snyam pa'i rnam rtog ni/ /de yod rnam par rtog pa yi/ /gegs yin de yang brdzun pa yin/ /de bas de ltar rnam dpyad pas/ /'ga' yang rgyu med yod ma yin/ /so so 'am ni 'dus
34b7(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /rkyen rnams la yang gnas ma yin/ /gzhan nas 'ongs pa 'pham? yin la/ /gnas pa m yin 'groma yin/ /rmongs pas bdren par gang byas 'di/ /sgyu ma las ni khyad ci yod/ /sgyu mas sprul pa gang yin dang/ /sgyu rnams kyis ni gang
35a1(mdo 'grel): sprul pa/ /de ni gang las 'ongs gyur cig /gang du 'gro ba'ang brtag par gyis/ /gang zhig gang ni nye pa yis/ /mthong 'gyur de med na min pa/ /bcos bu gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pas/ /de la bden nyid ji ltar yin/ /dngos po
35a2(mdo 'grel): yod par gyur pa la/ /rgyu yis dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /'on te de ni med na yang/ /rgyu yis dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /bye ba brgya phrag rgyu yis kyang/ /dngos po med pa bsgyur? du med/ /gnas skabs de dngos ji ltar yin/ /dngos 'gyur gzhan yang
35a3(mdo 'grel): gang zhig yin/ /med tshe dngos yod srid min na/ /dngos po yod par nam zhig 'gyur/ /dngos po skyes par ma gyur par/ /dngos med dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur/ /dngos med dang ni ma bral na'ang/ /dngos po yod pa'i skabs mi srid/ /dngos po'ang med
35a4(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur min te/ /rang bzhin gnyis su thal 'gyur phyir/ /de ltar 'gag pa yod min zhing/ /dngos po'ang yod min de yi phyir/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ /rtag tu ma skyes ma 'gags nyid/ /'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste/ /chu shing bzhin du snying po
35a5(mdo 'grel): med/ /mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das pa la'ang/ /de nyid du na khyad par med/ /de ltar stong pa'i dngos rnams la/ /thob pa ci yod shor ci yod/ /gang gi rim gro byas pa'am/ /yongs su brnyas pa'ang ci zhig yod/ /bde ba'ang sdug bsngal gang las yin/ /
35a6(mdo 'grel): mi ngag ci yod dgar? ci yod/ /de nyid du ni btsal byas na/ /gang zhig srang cing gang la srad/ /dpyad na gson pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /gang zhig 'di na 'chi 'gyur te/ /'byung 'gyur gang yin byung gyur gang/ /gnyen gang bshes kyang gang zhig yin/ /
35a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad nam mkha' 'dra bar ni/ /bdag 'dras yongs su gzung bar gyis/ /bdag nyid bde bar 'dod rnams ni/ /'thab dang spro ba'i rgyu dag gis/ /rab tu 'khrug dang dga' bar byed/ /mya ngan 'bad rtsol rtsod pa dang/ /phan tshun gcod dang 'bigs pa dang/ /
35b1(mdo 'grel): sdig dag gis ni tshogs chen 'tsho/ /bde 'gror yang dang yang 'ongs te/ /bde pa med po spyir spyad nas/ /shi nas ngan song sdug bsngal ni/ /yun ring mi zad rnams su ltung/ /srid pa na ni g.yangs sa mod/ /der ni de nyid min 'gri 'dra/ /der yang phan tshun 'gal
35b2(mdo 'grel): bas na/ /srid na de nyid 'di 'dra med/ /der yang dpe med mi bzang pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mdza' las 'das/ /der ni de lta stobs chung zhing/ /der ni tshe yang thung ba nyid/ /der yang gson dang nang med kyi/ /byed dang bkres pa'i ngal ba dang/ /gnyid dang 'tsho dang
35b3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ /byis dang 'grogs pa don med kyis/ /tshe 'di don med myur 'da' zhing/ /rnam dpyod shin tu rnyed par? dka' / /der yang rnam g.yeng goms pa 'di /bzlog pa'i thabs ni gal yod/ /der yang ngan song chen por ni/ /ltung phyir bdud ni brtson
35b4(mdo 'grel): pa byed/ /der ni log pa'i lam mang zhing/ /the tshom las kyang brgal dka' ste/ /slar yang ngal ba rnyed dka' zhing/ /sangs rgyas 'byung rnyed shin tu dka' / /nyon mongs chu bo spang dka' ste/ /e ma sdug bsngal brgyud par 'gyur/ /de ltar shin tu sdug bsngal
35b5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /rang sdug mi mthong gang yin pa /sdug bsngal chu sor? gnas 'di dag /gyi hung mya ngan bya bar 'os/ /dper na 'ga' zhig yang yang khrus/ /byas te yang yang med 'jug pa/ /de ltar shin tu sdug bsngal bar/ /gnas kyang bdag nyid
35b6(mdo 'grel): bder rlom bzhin/ /de ltar rga? dang 'tshe? med pa/ /bzhin du spyod pas gnas rnams la/ /dang po nyid du bsang byas nas/ /ngan song stung ba mi bzad 'ong/ /de ltar sdug bsngal med gdungs la/ /bsod nams sprin las legs byung ba'i/ /rang gi
35b7(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i tshogs char gyis/ /zhi byed bar bdag nam zhig 'gyur/ /nam zhig dmigs pa med tshul du/ /gus pas bsod nams tshogs bsags te/ /dmigs pas phung bar gyur rnams la/ /stong pa nyid ni ston par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' i
36a1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa la 'jug pa las shes rab bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa'o// //bdag gis byang chub spyod pa la/ /'jug pa rnam par brtsams pa yi/ /dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun/ /byang chub spyod la
36a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug par shog /phyogs rnams kun bas? dang sems/ /sdug bsngal nang pa ji snyed pa/ /de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyis/ /bde dga' rgya mtsho thob par shog /de dag sangs rgyas bde thob kyi/ bar du bde ba nyams ma gyur/ /'gro bas bla na
36a3(mdo 'grel): med pa yi/ /bde ba rgyun mi 'chad thob shog /'jig rten khams na dmyal ba dag /gang dag ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /de dag tu ni lus can rnams/ /bde can bde bas dga' bar shog /grangs bas nyams thag dro thob shog /byang chub sems
36a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' i sprin chen las/ /byung ba'i chu bo mdza' yas kyis/ /tsha bas nyams thag bsil bar shog /ral gri lo ma'i nags tshal yang/ /de la dga' tshal sdu gur shog /shal ma li yi sdong po yang/ /dpag bsam shing du 'khrungs par shog /
36a5(mdo 'grel): mthid? ril bur pa dag dang dad pa dang/ /gzhad sogs sked snyan 'byin pas mjos gyur cib/ /pad+ma dri bsung che ldan mtsho dag gis/ /dmyal pa'i sa phyogs dag ni nyams dgar shog/ sol phung de yang rin chen phung por gyur/ /sa bsregs shel
36a6(mdo 'grel): gyis gzhi bstan par shog /bsdus 'joms ri bo rnams kyang mchod pa yi/ /gzhal med khang gyur bde gshegs gang bar shog /ma dag ma rdo? bsregs mtshon gyi char pa dag /deng nas gzung ste me tog char par gyur/ /phan tshun mtshon
36a7(mdo 'grel): gyis 'dabs pa de yang ni/ /ded nas rtse phyir me tog 'phen par shog chu bo rab med me dang 'dra nang bying ba dag /sha? kun zhig gyur rus gong me tog kun de'i mdog /bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis lha yi lus thob nas/ /lha mo rnams dang
36b1(mdo 'grel): lhan cig dal gyis 'bab gnas shog /ci phyir 'dir ni gshin rje'i mi dang khwa dang bya rgod mi bzang rnams skrag byed/ /kun nas mun bsal bde dga' bskyed pa'i ma thub zad 'di ko su yi mthu snyam ste/ /gyon du bltas na nam mkha' i dkyil na phyag na rdo rje 'bar
36b2(mdo 'grel): ba bzhugs mthong nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sdig dang bral nas de dag lhan cig 'grogs par shog /me tog char pa spos chu 'dres pa bab pa yis/ /dmyal ba'i me mdag tshil tshil gsod pa mthong gyur nas/ /blo bur bde bas tshim pa 'di ci
36b3(mdo 'grel): bsams pa dang/ /sems dmyal rnams kyis phyag na pad+ma mthong bar shog /grogs dag 'jigs pa 'or? la dings par tshur shog bu?  bu'i thang du ni/ /gang gi mthu yis sdug bsgnal thams cad bral zhing dga' ba'i dbugs phyin la/ /'gro ba kun
36b4(mdo 'grel): skyob byang chub sems dang 'od dang brtse ba skyes gyur pa/ /gzhon nu zur phud can 'bar 'jigs pa med par byed pa ci zhig phyin/ /khyod kyi lha brgya'i cod pan dag gis zhabs kyi padmo la mchod cing/ /thugs rjes brlan can dbu la me tog du ma'i tshogs
36b5(mdo 'grel): kyi char 'bab pa/ /khang rtsegs yid 'ong lha mo stong phrag bstong dbyangs sgrogs pa 'di ltos zhes/ /'jam dbyangs de 'dra mthod nas da ni sems dmyal ku co 'don par shog /de ltar bdag gi dge rtsas kun tu bzang la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
36b6(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa med sprin bde ba dang/ /bsil zhing dri zhim dang ldang chang pa 'bebs mthod nas/ /sems can dmyal ba de dag mngon pa dang gar gyur cig /dud 'gro rnams ni gcig la gcig /za ba'i 'jigs dang bral bar shog /sgra mi snyan pa'i mi bzhin du//
36b7(mdo 'grel): yi dags rnams ni bde bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs? dbang gis/ /phyag nas 'bab pa'i 'o rgyun gyis/ /yi dags rnams ni tshim byas shing/ /khrus byas rtag tu bsil bar shog /long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong zhing/ /'on pas
37a1(mdo 'grel): rtag tu sgra thos shog /lha mo sgyu 'phrul bzhin du ni/ /sbrum ma'ang gnod med btsa' bar shog /gced bu rnams kyis gos ngag dang/ /bkres pa rnams kyis zas dang ni/ /skom pa rnams kyis chu dag dang/ /btung ba zhim po
37a2(mdo 'grel): thob par shog /bkres pa rnams kyis nor thob shog /mya ngan nyam thag dga' thob shog /yid chad rnams kyang yid sos shing/ /brtan pa phun sum tshogs par shog /sems can nad pa ji snying pa/ /myur du nang las thar gyur cig /'gro ba'i nad ni ma
37a3(mdo 'grel): lus pa/ /rtag tu 'byung ba med par shog /skrag pa rnams ni 'jigs med shog /bcings pa rnams ni grol bar gyur /mthu med rnams ni mthu ldan zhing/ /phan tshun sems ni mnyen gyur cig /'gron pa ngag ni thams cad la/ /phyogs rnams
37a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad bde bar shog /gang gi don du 'gro byed pa/ /de bshad mi dgos grub gyur cig /gru dang gru chen zhugs pa rnams/ /yid la bsams pa grub gyur te/ /chu yi dogs su bder phyin nas/ /gnyen dang lhan cig dga' bar shog /mya ngan lam
37a5(mdo 'grel): gol 'khyams pa rnams/ /'gron pa rnams dang phrad gyur nas/ /chom rkun stag sogs 'jigs med par/ /mi ngal bde blags 'dod bar shog /dgon sogs lam med nyam da bar/ /byis pa rgan po mgon med pa/ /gnyid log myos shing rab myos
37a6(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /lha ngag bsrung ba byed par shog /mi ngal kun las thar pa dang/ /dang dang shes rab brtse ldan zhing/ /zas dang spyod pa phun tshogs nas/ /rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur cig /thams cad nam mkha' i mdzod bzhin du/ /longs spyod chad pa med
37a7(mdo 'grel): par shog /rtsod pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /rang dbang du ni sbyong par shog /sems can gzi brjid chung ngu gang/ /de dag gzi bcing? nyen? thod shog /dka' thub can gang? gzugs ngan la /gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'jig rten bud
37b1(mdo 'grel): med ji snyed pa/ /de dag skyes pa nyid gyur cig /ma rabs rnams ni mtho thob cing/ /nga rgyal dag kyang bcom par shog /bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad ma lus pa/ /sdig pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ /rtag tu dge ba spyod par
37b2(mdo 'grel): shog /byang chub sems dang mi 'bral zhing/ /byang chub spyod la gzhol ba dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams gyis yongs bzung zhing/ /bdud kyi las rnams spang bar shog /sems can de dag thams cad ni/ /tshe yang dpag med ring bar shog /rtag tu bde bar 'tsho?
37b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /'chi ba'i sgra yang grag ma gyur/ /dpag bsam shing gi skyed mos tshal/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas sras/ /chos nyan sgrog pas gang ba yis/ /phyogs rnams thams cad dga' bar shog /thams cad du yang sa gzhi dag /gseg ma
37b4(mdo 'grel): la sogs med pa dang/ /lag mthil ltar mnyam bai DUrya'i/ /rang bzhin 'jam por gnas par gyur/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod dgur yang/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag /rang gi legs pas ?  dag brgyan par mdzad pas
37b5(mdo 'grel): bzhugs gyur cig /lus can kun gyi bya dang ni/ /shing dang 'od zer thams cad dang/ /nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra/ /rgyun mi 'chad par thos par shog /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang/ /sangs rgyas sras dang phrad gyur cig /mchod pa'i
37b6(mdo 'grel): sprin ni mdza' yas pas/ /'gro ba'i bla ma mchod par shog /lha yang dus su char 'bebs shing/ /lo tog phun sum tshogs par shog /rgyal po chos bzhin byer gyur cig /'jig rten dag kyang dar bar shog /sman rnams mthu dang ldan pa dang/
37b7(mdo 'grel): gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'grub par shog /mkha' 'gro srin po la sogs pa/ /snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur cig /sems can 'ga' yang sdug ma gyur/ /sdig par ma gyur na ma gyur/ /'jigs dang brnyas pa mi 'gyur zhing/ /
38a1(mdo 'grel): 'ga' yang yid mi bde ma gyur/ /gtsug lag khang rnams klog pa dang/ /kha ton gyis rgyas legs gnas shog /rtag tu dge 'dun mthun pa dang/ /dge 'dun don yang 'grub par shog /bslab pa 'dod pa'i dge slong dag /
38a2(mdo 'grel): dben ba dag kyang thob par shog /g.yeng ba thams cad spang nas ni/ /sems ni las rung bsgom gyur cig /dge slong ma rnams rnyed ldan zhing/ /'thab dang rtsod pa spang par shog /de bzhin rab tu byung ba? kun/ /tshul khrims nyams pa med gyur cig /
38a3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims 'chal pas yid byung nas/ /rtag tu sdig pa brad? byed shog /bde 'gro ngag kyang thob gyur nas/ /der yang brtul zhugs mi nyams shog /mkhas pa rnams ni bkur ba dang/ /bsod snyoms dag kyang rnyed par shog /rgyud ni yongs su dag
38a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /phyogs rnams kun tu grags par shog /ngan song sdug bsngal mi myong shing/ /dka' ba spyad pa med par yang/ /lha bas ltag pa'i lus kyis ni/ /de dag sangs rgyas myur 'grub shog /sems can kun gyis lan mang du/ /sangs rgyas
38a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad mchod byed cing/ /sangs rgyas bde ba bsam yas kyis/ /rtag tu bde dang ldan gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni/ /'gro don thugs la dgongs 'grub shog /mgon po yis ni gang dgongs pa/ /sems can
38a6(mdo 'grel): rnams la de 'byor shog /de bzhin rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /nyan thos rnams kyang bde gyur cig /bdag kyang 'jam dbyangs bka' drin gyis/ /sa rab dga' ba thob bar du/ /rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang/ /rab tu byung ba thob par shog /
38a7(mdo 'grel): bdag ni kha zas gyi nas kyang/ /nyams dang ldan zhing 'tsho bar shog /tshe rabs kun tu dben gnas pha/ /phun sum ldan pa'ang thob par shog /gang tshe blta bar 'dod pa'am/ /cung zad dri bar 'dod na yang/ /mgon po 'jam dbyangs de
38b1(mdo 'grel): nyid ni/ /gegs med par yeng mthong bar shog /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i/ /sems can kun don bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyod mdzad pa/ /bdag gi spyod ba'ang de 'drar shog /ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa dang/ /
38b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba ji sid gnas gyur pa/ /de srid bdag ni gnas gyur te/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sal bar shog /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gang ci'ang rung/ /de kun bdag la smin gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun gyis/ /'gro ba bde la spyod par shog
38b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sman gcig pu/ /bde ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bstan pa rnyed dang bkur sti dang/ /bcas te yun ring gnas gyur cig /gang gi drin gyis dge blo 'byung/ /'jam dpa' i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi drin byis
38b4(mdo 'grel): bdag ngar ba/ /dge ba'i bshes la'ang bdag phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las bsngo ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'drug pa slob dpon shan+ta de bas
38b5(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis /ba che'i dpe la gtugs te gtan la phab pa las/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA? sh+rI b+ha dra der?/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba rin chen
38b6(mdo 'grel): bzang po dang/ shAkya blo gros kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang 'grel ba dang mthun par bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/ /yang slad kyi bal? po'i paN+Dita su ma ti kIrti dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong? blo ldan shes rab kyis dag par bcos shir
38b7(mdo 'grel): zhus te/ legs par gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /spyod 'jug 'brel? ba shar? 'byung blo gros kyis mdzad pa bzhugs// // #/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsAryA ba tA ra pany+dzikA?/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug
39a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i dka' 'grel/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bam po dang po/ /bde bar gshegs pa chos sku dang bcas rnams dang
39a2(mdo 'grel): bde gshags sras/ /gti mug ljon pa rtsa nas bton cing spros pa rnams bcom pa/ /skye sogs sdug bsngal gyis bcom sems can phan la rjes 'jug pa/ /'od zer chen pos rgyal ba rnams la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ /byang chub spyod la 'jug pa yi/
39a3(mdo 'grel): tshig don zab mo rtogs byed pa/ /tshig dang ngag rnams rab gsal ba'i/ /dka' 'grol bdag gis brtsam par bya/ /byang chub spyod la 'jug pa'i don gang yin la shin tu blo gros gsal ba dang/ /gsung rab rol goms pas zhugs pa'i nang gi
39a4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid can gyis brjod nus te/ /de yi don la blo gros blun bdag smra bar dbang pa ci zhig de lta na'ang/ /gang phyir dge ba goms byas legs pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa des na bdag 'jug yin/ /yon tan bag chags cung zad dang ni spobs pa dang/
39a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan gyis mdzes blo gros bdag la 'ga' med kyang/ /de lta med kyi de 'dral bdag tshig 'jug gang/ /bshes gnyen dam pa bsten pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa yin/ /'dir 'phags pa zhi pa'i lha de gsung rab mdza' dag gi don gyi de kho
39a6(mdo 'grel): na nyid rtogs shing/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi che ba'i bdag nyid brnyes pa/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhed pa/ sems can rnams la thugs rje dang ldan pa/ rang gi bde ba la ltos pa med pa/ gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba bzhed pa
39a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i yon tan la thugs gzhol ba/ bdag nyid yon tan de la goms pas ro mtshog la zhugs shing/ gzhan dag la'ang lam de bstan pa'i ched du byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa mdzad par bzhed nas/ bde gshegs zhes
39b1(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni mdor bsdus nas don bdun bstan te/ dkon mchog gsum dang mkhan po la sogs pa phyag bya bar 'os pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ brjod par bya ba dang/ dgos
39b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de'i 'brel ba brjod pa bsten pa dang/ rang bzor rtsom pa spang ba dang/ zlos pa'i nyes pa spang ba'o/ /de la bde gshegs sras bcas chos sku dang zhes pas ni dkon mchog gsum bstan to/ /phyag 'tshal te zhes bya bas ni phyag
39b3(mdo 'grel): 'tshal ba'i bya ba'o/ /gus bas zhes pas ni de nyid kyi khyad par ro/ /phyag 'os kun la'ang zhes pas ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams la'o/ /bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa zhes bya bas ni brjod par bya ba bstan to/ /bstan par
39b4(mdo 'grel): bya zhes pas ni dgos pa brjod do/ /'brel pa bston pa'i tshig ni med de/ /de ni shugs nyid kyis rtogs par bya'o/ /lung bzhin zhes pa ni rang bzor rtsom pa spong ba'i tshig go /mdor bsdus nas zhes pa ni zlos pa spong ba'i tshig ste/ 'di ni bsdus
39b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i don to/ /yan lag gi don yang brjod par bya ste/ bde gshegs zhes pa la/ 'dir gshegs pa'i sgras ni so so'i skye bo rnams la bcom ldan 'das rnam par gcod pa ston te/ de rnams ni 'khor ba'i nang na gnas pa'i phyir dang/ bcom ldan
39b6(mdo 'grel): 'das ni 'khor ba las rnam par gshegs pa'i phyir ro/ /bde ba'i sgra ni mdzes pa la sogs pa don gsum la 'jug pas khyad par 'phags pa'i bde bar gshegs pa nyid gsungs so/ /de pas na don ni 'di yin te/ ci lta ba bzhin du bsngags
39b7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba ni 'di ltar dbu ma'i don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spangs par gshegs pas bde bar gshegs pa ste/ 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /yang na bsngags pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin
40a1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i de kho na nyid du gshegs pa ni rtogs pa ste bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /'dis ni rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /'di nyid kyis ni mu stegs can gyis ston pa rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'ang bstan
40a2(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /de rnams ni bdag la sogs par mngon par zhen pa'i lta bas mdzes par 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te/ bdag la sogs pa yang tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir dang/ 'khor ba'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir mdzes par 'gro ba ma yin no/ /
40a3(mdo 'grel): slar mi ldog par gshegs pa ni yang skye ba dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyi rgyu ngar 'dzin pa'i sa bon ma rig pa rnam pa thams cad du spangs pas bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/
40a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams las bcom ldan 'das khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa yin te/ de rnams ni bsngags par gshegs kyang rgyu rnam pa thams cad du ma spangs pa'i phyir slar ldog pa srid pa'i phyir ro/ /ma lus pa yang ji srid du bgrod par
40a5(mdo 'grel): bya bar gshegs pa ste/ nyes pa thams cad kyi bag chags lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gnas ngan len gyi mtshan nyid dang/ /rang gi rtogs pa'i lam ston pa la mi gsal ba spangs pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /de dag gis ni bcom ldan
40a6(mdo 'grel): 'das rdzogs par gshegs pa nyid du bstan to/ /'dis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams las bcom ldan 'das thun mongs ma yin pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de rnams ni nyon mongs pa can
40a7(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang/ rang gi rtogs pa'i lam ston pa la gsal ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta na sangs rgyas nyid yon tan ma lus pa'i gzhi dang/ /gzhan dag dangthun mong ma yin no zhes bde bar gsheD
40b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i ? bstan to/ /de lta bur gyur ba'i bde bar gshegs pa de rnams la gus pas te mchog tu dad pas so/ /phyag 'tshal te zhes pa ni phyag byas te bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa brjod par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro/ /ji lta bur gyur
40b2(mdo 'grel): bzhig tsa na/ sras bcas zhes pa ste/ thub pa rnams kyi sras kyang 'dir rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid bzung? ngo/ /de rnams nyid 'dir dbang par gyur pa'i phyir de rnams dang bcas pa'o/ /bye brag 'dis?
40b3(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal ba bsdus pa yin no/ /bye brag gzhan gsungs pa chos sku dang bcas zhes pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spros pa thams cad dang bral pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi sku'o/ /de nyid ni rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos so/ /
40b4(mdo 'grel): yang na sku'i sbra ni tshogs kyi don te/ skye bo'i tshogs dang dpung gi tshogs zhes bya ba yin no/ /nges gsung rab kyang gzung ste/ /de dang bcas pa'o/ /'dis kyang chos la phyag 'tshal ba bsdus pa yin no/ /de ltar na 'dis ni dkon mchog gsum la phyag
40b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal pa nye bar bstan pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas las chos las 'phags ba'i dge 'dun te zheS pa'i go rim ma yin nam/ de ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi de ma thag tu 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang/ de'i rjes la chos zhes go rim 'chol par bstan ce na/
40b6(mdo 'grel): bden te 'dir tshigs su bcad pa sbyar pa'i ngor byas pa'i phyir go rim 'chol bar bstan par rig par bya'o/ /sbyar ba ni bde gshegs chos kyi sku mda' sras bcas la phyag 'tshal te zhes go rim nyid bzhin bya ste/ des na nyes ba med do/ /yang na
40b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang rtogs pa'i chos mnga' ba'i phyir rjes su mthun pa'i phyir na chos kyi sku yod pa nyid de/ chos kyi sku dang bcas pa de rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa'i don du'o/ /de rnams kyang chos nyid rtog par bde bar
41a1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa nyid du nges pa yin te/ bde bar gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir chos las sngar bstan to/ /des na mi rigs pa cung zad kyang med do/ /ci 'di rnams kho na la yin nam zhe na/ phyag 'os kun la'ang zhes gsungs te/
41a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan phyag bya bar 'os pa mdza' dag la'ang ste/ slob dpon dang mkhan po la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal te zhes pa phyed snga mas bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal ba brjod nas/ phyed phyi mas brjod po?/
41a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bde gshegs sras zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sras ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams las skyes pa'i sras te/ rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de rnams kyi sdom la
41a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa ni bsdams par bya ba'am 'dis sdom par byed bas na sdom pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems gzung ba sngon du song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa yang dag par blang ba yin la/ de 'ang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /de la 'jug
41a5(mdo 'grel): pa ni 'jug par bya ba 'am/ 'dis de la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir 'jug pa ni lam ste/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' i go 'phang thob pa na bde bar gshegs pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de gzhung 'dis bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de
41a6(mdo 'grel): ltar na 'dis ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir sdom la 'jug pa ni 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin la/ 'dis ni sdom la 'jug pa'i brjod par byed pa yin no/ /de ltar na brjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba yang don gyis
41a7(mdo 'grel): bstan pa yin la/ bstan pa ni rjod par byed pa'i dgos pa ste/ dngos su ni brjod par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa nyid de'i dgos pa'o/ /brjod par bya ba'i dgos pa yang thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rim
41b1(mdo 'grel): pas sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas nyid ni dgos pa mthar thug pa yin no/ /'di yang bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug ba'i sgra nyid kyis bsdus pa yin te/ de'ang gang zhig phan yon bstan pas zung gyis ston par 'gyur te/ mi gtsang lus
41b2(mdo 'grel): 'di blangs nas rgyal ba'i sku/ /rin chen rin thang med par bsgyur bas na zhes ston to/ /de ltar 'brel ba dang/ brjod par byed pa dang/ dgos pa rnams ni 'jug pa'i yan lag tu bstan te/ gzhan dun brjod par bya ba la sogs pa med bar dogs?
41b3(mdo 'grel): pa 'dir rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis rang bzor brjod pa ma yin nam/ 'dis su zhig 'dzin par 'gyur zhe na/ lung bzhin zhes gsungs te/ lung las ma 'das bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ltar gzhan gsung
41b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag gis de'i don las ma 'das par bstan par bya'o/ /'dis ni lung las rang bzod brtsom pa yongs su spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni rang dga' ma yin no zhes pa'i don to/ /'dis bdag nyid kyis gsung rab kyi don rtogs
41b5(mdo 'grel): par yang zur gyis bstan pa yin te/ 'di yang 'jug pa'i yan lag nyid do/ /gal te lud bzhin du bstan par bya ba ma yin nam/ de lta na lung nyid la de 'dod pa rnams 'jug par 'gyur na/ des na ci 'dis ci zhig bya zhe na/ mdor bsdus nas
41b6(mdo 'grel): zhes gsungs te/ mdor byas nas so/ /gal te lung du bstan par gyur pa de lta mod kyis mdo sde sna tshogs pa de rnams su shin tu rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir la/ kho bos ni mdor byas shing bsdus nas bstan par bya ba ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /
41b7(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni zlos pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin te/ 'di yang 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa spangs pa yin no/ /de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yan lag yin pas na brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa ni mi rigs pa ma yin no/ /'o na phyag 'tshal ba
42a1(mdo 'grel): brjod pa don med pa yin no zhe na/ de'ang legs pa thob pa la sogs pa'i don du brjod par byed pa yin na ji ltar na don med pa nyid yin 'di'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te/ bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal ba
42a2(mdo 'grel): las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi sems kyi rgyud yang dag par brlan pas sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i rgyun shin tu bsrabs pas bgegs nye bar zhi ba ni brtsams pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ skye bo dam pa mdza' dag son pa'i lam du
42a3(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid rjes su 'gro bar yang bstan par 'gyur ba dang/ 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa la phyag byas pa thos pa las yod pa nyid srid pa yin no zhes nyan pa po rnams bdag nyid dang gzhung la yang gus pa skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ /'dir yang bde
42a4(mdo 'grel): bar gshegs pa'i sgras brjod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'i bdag nyid thos pa las de 'dod pas de bskyed pa la gzhol ba'i yid kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi sdom pa la 'jug pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa dang
42a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa dag 'dir 'jug bar 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /des ni 'di ltar gang gis gang 'dod pa dang byed par 'dod pa de nyid bya ste/ gzhan ma yin la gzhan du byed na skabs ma
42a6(mdo 'grel): yin pa brjod pa dang/ ha cang thal bar 'gyur la/ de'i phyir 'di yang sdom pa la 'jug pa ston par mdzad pa dgongs pa yin na/ ci'i phyir skabs su ma bab pa'i 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/ sngar brjod ba'i nyes pa gnyis su
42a7(mdo 'grel): thal bar 'gyur ro zhes gang zhig brjod pa de yang bsal bar gyur pa yin la/ de ma thag nyid du de la mkho bo bsnyad pa'i phyir skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa ni ma yin no/ /gang zhig de ma thag tu mkho bo de ni brjod par bya ba yin te/ /gzhan
42b1(mdo 'grel): du ma yin no/ /de ltar na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir thams cad 'ges? par gnas pa yin no/ /ci ste lung las lhag pa ma yin par mdor bsdus nas brjod par byed pa yin na'ang don la khyad par med pa'i phyir ji ltar na khyad par du 'jug pa'i
42b2(mdo 'grel): yan lag gi sgo nas 'ga' zhig gis blang bar bya bar 'gyur/ de lta bas na 'dir lung las lhag ba cung zad kyang brjod pa'i bya ba yin no/ /zhes dogs nas/ sngon chad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dir lung las lhag pa sngan chad ma
42b3(mdo 'grel): byung ba gzhan cung zad 'dir bdag la lhag pa brjod pa med do/ /yang na ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to/ /'o na do las lhag par brjod pa med na yang 'di'i tshig gi don spros pa'i khyad par can du 'gyur te/ de lta bas na yang khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na/
42b4(mdo 'grel): 'dir sde ba sbyor zhes bya ba gsungs te/ sdeb sbyor ni don dang tshig bkod pa'i khyad par yang yod pa yin na/ de la mkhas shing brtags pa bdag la yod pa ma yin no/ yang na yang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o/ /gal te de ltar yin na 'di gzhan
42b5(mdo 'grel): gyi don la mkho pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ de phyir gsungs te/ gzhan gyi thal bar brjod pa nyid khas len par byed de/ gang gi phyir sngon med pa brjod pa'i nus pa bdag la med cing/ sdeb sbyor mkhas pa yang bdag la yod pa ma yin no/ /
42b6(mdo 'grel): de nyid kyi phyir gzhan don gyi bsam pa bdag la mkho ba 'di yang yod pa ma yin la/ rnam par rtog pa yang bdag la yod pa ma yin te/ de la nus pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /'o na ci'i phyir 'di byed pa'i don du 'bad par byed ce na/
42b7(mdo 'grel): rang gi yid la zhes gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa goms pa'i ros khong nas gong du bsgom par 'dod pas so/ /'di zhes te/ rab tu byed pa 'am/ sdom pa la 'jug pa bstan pa bdag gis
43a1(mdo 'grel): brtsams shing byas pa'o/ /'das pa'i rkyen bstan pa ni nang gi dngos po rdzogs par thugs la bzhag pa yin no/ /re zhig rang gi don du gzhung rtsom pa yang ma mthong la/ rang gis byas pas bdag nyid la khyad par 'jig
43a2(mdo 'grel): pa'ang ma yin te/ dngos po la 'dus byas pa'i khyad par yang bdag nyid la sngar nyid nas yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na/ 'dir dge ba bsgom phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gzhung 'di yis sam de'i don gyis so/ /dge ba ni dge legs te/
43a3(mdo 'grel): de yid la byed pa'o/ /bsgom phyir ni bskrun par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /dad ba'i shugs 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni sems dang pa'i rgyun gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur ba ste/ rgyun tu 'byung bar rab tu 'jug pa yin no/ /'dis ni rang gi don du byed pa
43a4(mdo 'grel): nyid du nyams su myong bas 'di grub par bstan no/ /gzhan gyi cung zad byed pa yang srid pa yin no zhes bstan pa/ bdag dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gal te zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan nye bar bkod pa'o/ /rang gi don du byed pa
43a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni re zhig nyams su myong bas grub pa yin la/ gal te yang bdag dang rang bzhin mnyam pa gzhan kha cig gi gzhung dam don 'di mthong zhing rtogs na gzhan gyi don kha mkho ba'i phyir 'di yang don bcas yin to/ /de'i phyir yang gzhan
43a6(mdo 'grel): gyi don la mkho ba'i yang phyir 'di dgos pa dang bcas pa yin no/ /'dis kyang ni gzhan gyi don la mkho ba yin pa'i phyir 'di don dang bcas shing dgos pa dang bcas pa yin te/ ci zhig ltar yang gzhan gyi don la mkho ba srid
43a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'dis bdag nyid mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa nyid du bstan to/ /da ni sdom pa la 'jug pa bstan pa 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir gleng bslang ba sbyar ba/ dal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa
43b1(mdo 'grel): gsungs te/ mi khom pa brgyad spangs pa ni ngal ba 'byor pa'o/ /tshogs pa 'di ni shin tu rnyed dka' ba ste/ shin tu dka' pas rnyed par bya ba yin no/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i gnya' shing gi bu gar ru sbal gyi mgrin pa chud pa lta bur ji zhig ltang thob par bya ba thob
43b2(mdo 'grel): pa ni rnyed pa'o/ /de yang skyes bu'i don sgrub pa ste skyes bu'i don ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de sgrub pa ni rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir de nus pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /gal te de lta bur
43b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa 'di la phan pa ma bsgrubs na ste/ rang dang gzhan la bde ba'i rgyu mtho ris dang thar pa sgrub par byed pa ma blangs na de'i tshe phyis te slar yang ngo/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang/ dad pa dang mi khom pa brgyad spangs pa'i mi'i dngos po zhes
43b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba ste/ 'di yang dag 'byor ba ni phrad pa dang 'du ba dang tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /ga la ni ci ltar ga las kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ mi mkhom pa'i gnas skabs na shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir na chos rab tu rnam par 'byed par bya
43b5(mdo 'grel): bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs ba'o/ /ji skad du/ 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdor/ /'phags pa rgyal ba drod kyi skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa las mi khom pa brgyad las ldog pa yang rnyed par dka' / mi nyid thob pa yang rnyed par
43b6(mdo 'grel): dka' / ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag pa yang rnyed par dka' / sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang rnyed par dka' / dbang po mchad pa med pa yang rnyed par dka' / /sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan pa yang rnyed par dka' / /skyes bu dam pa dang 'gregs
43b7(mdo 'grel): pa yang? rnyed par dka' / yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnyed par dka' / yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pa nye bar sbyor ba yang rnyed par dka' / mi'i 'jig rten na yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba yang rnyed par dka' o zhes gsungs so/ /'di nyid
44a1(mdo 'grel): la dgongs nas 'jig rten na ni mi rnyed dka' / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dka' / /de bas dang dang rab byung dang/ /grub pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' / /sems can kun la rjes brtsebs/ /sdug bsngal thams cad
44a2(mdo 'grel): rab zhi'i phyir/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag /gcig nas gcig tu dkon pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /yang mi khom pa ni 'di rnams yin te/ dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dag /kla klo tshe rings lha dang ni/ /log lta sangs rgyas mi 'byung dang/ /
44a3(mdo 'grel): lkugs pa 'dir ni mi khom brgyad ces so/ /de bas na da lta nyid du brtson par bya'o/ /da ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung ba'i don du de la 'dod pa bskyed ba'i phyir phan yon la 'jug pa/ /ji ltar mtshan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/
44a4(mdo 'grel): ci ltar mtshan mo'i sprin 'dus pa'i dus su sprin rnams kyis mun nag shin tu stug par gyur pa na glog 'gyur skad cig thang cig tsam snang bar byed de/ dngos por gyur ba cung zad rab tu gsal bar byed do/ /'dir yang dpe de nyid sangs rgyas mthu yis zhes
44a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sogs gsungs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid phan pa dang bde ba la sbyor ba'i phyir skal ba can dang skal ba can ma yin pa'i sems can gyi rgyud la gzigs shing rtag tu bzhugs te/ gang gi tshig gang du thabs gang gis gang la skal
44a6(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ ldan pa gang yin pa gzigs nas/ de'i tshe der thabs des de la de byin gyis rlob par mdzad cing/ skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i gnas skabs su btang snyoms kyis bzhugs so/ /de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ci
44a7(mdo 'grel): zhig ltar na rnyed? par dka' ba 'byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten te/ skye bo'i bsod nams phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyu dge ba'i las rnams la blo gros yud tsam zhig 'byung ste/ de ni der mi brtan pa'i phyir dang/ 'khor ba thog ma med par 'jig rten gyi
44b1(mdo 'grel): khams mi dge ba'i phyogs nyid la goms pa'i phyir ro/ /nges cir 'gyur zhe na/ de ltas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gang gis phyir de lta bas na dge ba ste/ bsod nams nyams chung ba dang stobs dang bral ba nyid glog 'gyu ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro//
44b2(mdo 'grel): rtag ces bya ba ni dus thams cad shin tu nyam chung ba yin no/ /de lta na gang la shin tu stobs che ba yod ce na/ sdig pa stobs chen zhes gsungs pa la/ stobs chen ni yang mi dge ba chen po yin te/ phyi'i sprin rum gyi mun pa dang 'ang ba'i phyir ro/
44b3(mdo 'grel): de'i mi bzad pa ni shin tu 'jigs par byed pa ste/ dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skyed bar byed pa'i phyir dang/ thub par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar 'di la nus pa chen po yod du chug kyang de lta na yang de las gzhan bsod nams stobs dang ldan
44b4(mdo 'grel): pas rgyal bar byed par 'gyur te/ de ltar yang cung zad kyang nyams pa med do zhe na/ de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ nus pa chen po dang ldan pa de lta bu de ni gzhan gang gis te/ cig shos bsod nams kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing
44b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar 'gyur te/ gzhan gang gis kyang ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang ci'i phyir 'di ltar brjod ce na/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste sangs rgyas nyid la sems can thams cad yang dag par
44b6(mdo 'grel): gdon ba'i bsam pa de thob par bya ba'i don du ltag pa'i bsam pa sems gang zhig yid la byed pa ste/ gal te de med par gyur na'o/ /nus pa chen po yang de las gzhan stobs che bas rgyal bar byed de mtshan mo'i mun pa la nyi mas byed pa bzhin du/
44b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi sems las gzhan gnyen po srid pa yang ma yin no/ /de lta bas na de gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems nyid blang bar bya ste/ gzhan ni ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems blangs par bya ba yin no zhes bskal ba zhes
45a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa 'dis kyang gsungs te/ bar gyi bskal pa gcig kyang bskal pa yin la/ bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu yang bskal pa yin zhing/ bar gyi bskal ba brgyad cu yang bskal pa yin te/ de la yang bskal pa chen
45a2(mdo 'grel): po zhes brjod la/ 'di ni bskal pa chen po nyid du gzung ngo/ /bskal pa mang por te bskal pa grangs med pa dang po'i khongs su gtogs pa rnams so/ /rab dgongs mdzad pa ni 'bad pas sems par mdzad pa rnams kyis te/ gzigs pa
45a3(mdo 'grel): ni rtogs pa'o/ /thub dbang rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis so/ /phan pa'i don thams cad grub par rung ba yin te/ de'i sa bon du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /'di nyid ni byang chub kyi sems nyid do/ /ci'i phyir 'di kho
